Summary: this hotel was really nice, the reason for the 3 stars is because their pool is in the shade all day. it might just be time of year but it was disappointing to learn this on the lovely sunny days that LA gets that we couldn't sit out at the pool.  especially coming from a cold country. The room was clean, spacious.  For me another minus was not having a mirror close to a plug that wasn't in the bathroom.  it meant that whilst my husband was showering I couldn't blow dry my hair and when he was finished the bathroom was very warm to blow dry my hair.  The staff here were very helpful and if your going to Disney its great, couple of minutes walk and its very close to restaurants. you can also take a bus a few minutes walk away to the staples centre.  I would stay here again but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. Summary: We were staying in the DoubleTree the night before the Woolsey fire broke out in Thousand Oaks. We received notification at 3:00AM our neighborhood was under evacuation. Our friend who was dog sitting our dog had nowhere to go. Her husband is on deployment to Japan so she had to pack to her 6 month old and 6 year old sons, her dog, our dog, and her cat by herself. She had nowhere to go so we told her to come stay in our suite with us while we were figuring out how to best handle the evacuation. Your staff was incredibly accommodating to these special circumstances. All is safe now and we will be coming back in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! Summary: We had to suddenly evacuate our home in LA due to the recent firestorm and I called Hilton to help us find a room.  The first available was the Doubletree Suites in Anaheim.  We arrived at 4am and were really taken care of.  We had our 90-year old neighbors with us so we got 2 rooms.  Thank goodness we had the extra room for our belongings which we had thrown in our cars  from the evacuation.  Staff was so helpful and pleasant.  Hotel was very nice, clean, and food was very good.  I can not say enough good things about this hotel and their staff.  They went above & beyond.

Summary: The staff was friendly, the cookies were delicious and I truly enjoyed being able to run through downtown Disney every day. I think that it would be nice to have coffee in the lobby each morning and a wine and cheese in the afternoon for Hilton Honor members. Although there is coffee in the room it is not very good.

Summary: This hotel is below average. When we got there they took forever to have our room ready. Me and my husband slept in our rental car waiting for them to have the room clean and ready. After they said they would call us to let us know the room is ready, which they never did, the room was finally ready after two hours. I had mentioned to them if they have any upgrades or do anything special because we were there for my birthday, and the front desk told us that they would do something special for us on the day of. They never did. The room never felt clean, it feels like housekeeping just did the bare minimum. They have a card to place on top of the pillow if you want the sheets changed and we put that card on the pillow every day and we never felt like they were changed or clean.

Great location..We personally did not walk to the parks, We took Lyfts and Ubers which both ways to and from the park were cheaper than parking at the garage for Disneyland. The hotel was dead silent so nice and a rare find so close to the parks.

Very lovely place and conveniently located on the street of Disneyland. Far enough from the noise but close enough to be walking distance (about a mile). Staff was very friendly and our room was quite nice as well.

Rooms were clean but staff not very friendly so you didn’t want to ask for help. It’s a pretty long walk for kids to Disneyland but for adults it’s very doable.Parking a little expensive to park rental car we don’t drive much.

My family and I love staying here! We keep coming back when we go to Disneyland. It is clean and so comfortable. The cookies are the best part! 😉 we will definitely be coming back to stay here as long as we can afford to.

Summary Heading: Great Room with Easy Access to Disney
Summary: The room was perfect.  We could be in the living room and people could be in bed and have two different tvs going.  Access to disney was super easy using public shuttle.  We will stay there again next year.

I’ve never stayed in a cleaner more well run hotel. My experience was stellar from room to food to staff. I had a few specific issues with business things that came up and everyone was super helpful. The restaurant in the evenings was great!

This was the worse guest room ever. Room 713 is 'L' shaped and poorly designed. This left a very narrow 'hall like' area for the bed, and a desk around the corner where it is not practical, and a bathroom almost as big as the bedroom (priority of space goes to the bathroom?). The room made me feel claustrophobic and anxious which made for a bad day the next day. This was not the shape of the room in the map where I chose my room. Very misleading. And sleeping in the bathroom would have been more comfortable. This room was so awful that I am not sure if I will return to this property or not. Two prior visits had great rooms. Will I be tricked into another horrible room if I returned to this property? Maybe...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. Please accept our sincere apologies about your room situation, as this is not the normal room type we have here.  Almost all of our rooms are spacious suites. We appreciate your business and hope you will give us another chance to take care of you in the future.   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This was my first trip to USA and we were given early checkin and very fast checkin after a long flight from Australia. Starff were always very helpful and friendly and nothing was a problem. Very good and friendly service here.

Summary: it was nice experience but can be much better....the rooms was lovely and warm feeling....all the ambiance....just few of the staff are not interested for the guest....but i was not there because of the staff....but its a very important thing....big thanks to all the staff how give the maksimum and was lovely and helpful....it was for some of them small thing  but it makes a big opinion about the Hotel....food....room....place....everything Hotel like Hotel was good....

Upon arrival I was greeted with the most amazing hospitality, friendliness and caring staff. I found out I made an error, therefore I drove to the correct hotel just down the street.The staff were not friendly form the moment I walked in. As I was being checked in, the front desk clerk (who later I found out was actually the Guest Service Manager) did not make eye contact and was appeared “put off” to have to be assisting me. I noticed that this had not shown as a direct bill, so I asked about it and was told “Nope”, I said well there must be some mistake because I confirmed with my travel agent that it was set up

Summary: What a nice hotel! The staff were friendly and the room was very clean and comfortable. I ate at the restaurant Agio a couple of times and the food was great.  Disneyland was within walking distance about 15-20 min walk away. I used the shuttle the hotel offered. It was $5.50US a day. There were a few restaurants around the area which were within walking distance too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We are located very close to Disneyland and are thrilled to hear you used the ART shuttle too.  We hope you can come back and visit again soon!  Management

Summary: I stayed 5 nights at this location and it was a very pleasant stay. I did drove so I'm not sure what are the parking charges. I was at 4th floor and it has a nice pool view along with Disney fireworks. It's actually a very nice family friendly hotel and I'm definitely considering to bring my family and stay here on my next visit. However, my only complain is water doesn't drain quick enough in tub nor in sink. Really annoying since I was at Hilton property not just some motel where people experience such stuff. Besides that, perfect stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay!  We hope the next time you are in the area you do bring your family! It would be perfect for a trip to Disneyland and watching the fireworks in the comfort of your own room. We look forward to your return visit!  Management

Summary Heading: Near the Happiest Place on Earth
Summary: We stayed in Anaheim to visit our fellow relatives and being near the Disney Parks was very nice! The staff members were kind and the room we had was on the 7th floor. It was very clean and we loved getting the cookies upon our arrival. It has a gift shop on the lobby floor with some Disney stuff and Downtown Disney is very close. I'm impressed by how spacious the room was!  The breakfast could be better. I was a tad disappointed and it could have a bit more variety to it. I would recommend having am omlette station. I believe the guests would enjoy that a lot.  Overall, the staff's kindness compensated for the breakfast. They made everything convenient for check-in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience! We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Management

Summary Heading: Great place to stay while we rested from a day at Disney.
Summary: We planned a last minute 2 day trip to Disneyland and California Adventure. We needed a place to stay with a short notice, and Double Tree came through. The rooms are suite style, and very nicely appointed. Very close to the theme parks, and all sorts of dining options. The staff was very friendly and attentive. Definately worth the price, which by the way was not bad at all, for the level of quality you get. Be advised there are parking fees, as with many of the hotels in the area. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are very pleased to learn you enjoyed the proximity of our theme parks and dining options.  We are also so happy to hear how friendly and attentive our staff was during your stay! Please visit again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Stay close to Disneyland for less
Summary: We stayed here recently and had a Queen Suite. While the room is a bit outdated, it is comfortable and clean. The coffee shop downstairs is quick and full of friendly employees. The gift shop is a nice touch for any last minute items or unexpected needs. The bellmen are courteous and quick and incredibly friendly. I would give this location 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that the men working the front desk were more concerned with their conversation together, and seemed a bit put out by us checking in and having questions. There is shuttle service available through The ART for $5.50 for round trip, just be aware that the buses do not seem to run every 20 minutes in the morning due to the number of people trying to get to Disneyland in the morning, but their is a bus stop

Summary: Our room was on 4th floor. We heard the vehicles noise especially motorcycle from the street. The bed and pillows are not firm. We woke up with back and neck pains. We paid over $450+ for 2 nights. For the price we paid, we were expected at least double panel windows.

Summary: Our family of three adults and two children checked into Doubletree Anaheim on 6 October 2018 for three nights. What a disappointment with this hotel. Service was non existent and the staff were most unfriendly and disrespectful in their mannerisms. As a Diamond member, one would think you will look after your most loyal guests.  We asked for water and the front desk staff told us that water only provided at check-in and not on stays. I have not encounter other Hiltons that do not provide at least water during your stay.  The breakfast at Agio restaurant was most disappointing with food selection. The quality was also not satisfactory. After the first visit, that was the end of our breakfast at the restaurant. It did us some good as we all can do with some calories lost.  We

Summary: Clean rooms. Price is high because it’s location. Hotel is plain, rooms are small, clean rooms, comfortable bed, great staff, extra parking fee! Walking distance to convention center. I would expect bigger room and more of a grand feeling in the lobby for the cost.

Summary Heading: Decent and Comfortable Stay with a Good location
Summary: We took a room on the 3rd last floor from the top, think it was 17th or 18th floor facing the Disneyland. So, fortunately we saw the fireworks at Disneyland at 9:30 on the nights we stayed back in the Hotel room. There is a shuttle operating from the hotel to Disneyland which makes it even more convenient. You have Best Buy electronic store just across the road, 10 mins walk you can find a shopping complex, you have a mexican restaurant "El torito" just behind it.   The staff is friendly, and they are quick, did not take too much of our time during check in and check out. We were welcomed with a chocolate cookie which was delicious.  So our stay was great, comfortable, clean bed and pillows, perfect lighting. You have all basic amenities available in the room.   We did our

Summary: The hotel is a good walking distance from Disneyland. As soon as you walk in to the hotel, you smell cookies. At check in you are given delicious cookies. Staff is very friendly and the room was very clean. Comfy pillow and bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! Summary: This was our 4th time at this hotel and will keep going back when in Anaheim. Love the warm welcome, especially the chocolate chip cookies which seem to get better every year. Great 1 bedroom suite, we had pool and fireworks view this time which was great. All the staff were very friendly and helpful when needed. Special thanks to the concierge that helped us out(sorry I didn't get his name) and Very special thanks to the bartender Denver, really super guy, awesome service and went above and beyond to take care of us. Food in restaurant for breakfast was good, decent choices, only complaint was the scrambled eggs were a bit cold and runny from the veggies that were in them but still really tasty, would have been perfect if not for that. Plain scrambled eggs were good, no issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This hotel was an awesome place to stay during our Disney trip! :) We has conjoined suites and were very satisfied. Beds were super comfy and there is a shuttle that will pick you up right out front to and from Disney for $5.50 a day per person. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Clean, Nice Rooms and Friendly Staff
Summary: I would have given this 5 stars if it was 2 blocks closer to Disney!   Quiet, nicely appointed rooms, except for sofa bed (hard....  might be okay for small children).   Just a bit far for walk back to hotel after a day at Disney. Staff is very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: My wife and I celebrated our anniversary and my birthday here, and it was great! They were so accommodating, polite, and made it extra special for us for our occasion. This was our first time staying here, but it definitely won't be our last!
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Spacious hotel at a reasonable price
Summary: This hotel offers great service and we have been impressed with the spacious rooms, cleanliness, friendly staff, and nice amenities. We have stayed here twice. Once we had a full suite (was a nice surprise) and once a king room (which was also spacious). The staff are super friendly. There are multiple dining options including room service. We like the coffee bar in the morning. If you are going to Disneyland, you can purchase your tickets at the hotel. In addition, the walk to Disney is nearly 1 mile I think, but it is a nice walk and very doable.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: My family I did our annual West Coast trip in August (apologize for the delayed review) and we were very pleased with the Double Tree Suites. We stayed here because we were originally booked in L.A. but the room there didn't accommodate the family so we took the drive to Anaheim and wasn't disappointed. Parking was convenient and check-in was a breeze. The lobby was grand although the furniture was a tad dated but the overall  experience compensated for that. The room was a site for soar eyes as it was a spacious clean suite with plenty of room for me, my wife and my son. Very clean property overall and the area is wonderful with a very high walk score to restaurants, grab and go's and of course Disney Land. We even did laundry across the street from the hotel which is always a
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This was our first time staying here and we were very pleased. We arrived at the hotel at 7:30 AM so that we could get to Disneyland at park opening. When we got to the front desk, we were pleasantly greeted by Brittany. She was very welcoming and congratulated us on our anniversary. Since we got there way before our scheduled check in, we were planning on just dropping off our bags and checking in later that evening after we got back from the park. However, after Brittany did her magic she was able to get us an early check-in and were able to take our bags straight to our room. Not only did this save us time but now we could go straight to our room after being on our feet all day long. Brittany went above and beyond to provide us top notch service that really made our stay over

A quality hotel, just minutes from Disneyland, Angels Stadium, and the Anaheim Convention Center. Quiet, clean rooms and friendly staff ensured that my stay went well. My only knock came after a less than perfect experience at the hotel restaurant. Otherwise, I would highly recommend.

Rooms loud, furniture outdated. Hotel need tons upgrades. On a positive not, room are clean. Restraunt  was nice and food was ok. Bar was nice drink, are slightly over-priced. I do not plan to return. 😀

The travel agent had booked this hotel for us so I hadn’t researched it like the others - but we were very pleasantly surprised when we arrived.  Warm cookies on check in lovely big room with bedroom and living space. Good to have the two areas with 2 TVs and microwave. Very comfortable beds and very good breakfast which we had included.  Staff were very helpful and friendly especially the breakfast staff. The swimming pool was nice to use after a day in the parks and was never busy. Location was excellent we could walk to the parks very easily or there was a bus ( ticket available from reception)  we recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again. We even got a cookie on departure as we were waiting in reception for our taxi to the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Great stay...clean hotel. Disneyland office right off main lobby for tickets & questions before you go to park. Little bit too far to walk to Disney...take the bus. Get the 2-bed room with fold-out couch...worth it for the $$ - you have a separate sitting area for family after a day at the park. On-site parking is $20 per day extra...plan for that.  1st time staying there...I will go back next trip.

As for the conventions this hotel is definitely not the best, the walk to the Center is threw a huge car park and takes 10 minutes just to get close to the Convention area which still is huge inside. The gym is tiny and pool outdoors as well is very little and not adequate to have a nice relax after long day. The laundry service failed once what was hard for me as I was there for a week full Of events.  It might be a good option for Disney but do not expect anything else than sleep over. Staff was very nice generally. Hotel is at the end of the hotel area so you do not get anything close by.

For this Disney trip I had myself and my Daughter for this Double Tree stay so I wasn't looking for a big room but when we walked in I was impressed by the large space. I definitely think my family of 6 would be comfortable. With the double sinks and extra space we wouldn't be on top of each other like some other Disneyland hotels. We walked over to the Disney tram next to the Homewood Suites and got a ride to the front gate. An included breakfast would have been nice, the Starbucks pastries weren't very fresh.

Summary Heading: Great Anaheim Hotel Close to Disney
Summary: You could stay closer to Disneyland, but would you want to? We saw hotels closer, but the price increased exponentially and they didn’t look that great. This hotel is about 3/4 of a mile from the park entrance. We took an Uber from the hotel to the park ($6). Rooms were very clean, we splurged and got the rooms with a view of the fireworks display...awesome. The restaurants on site were very good and had a special of kids eat free for dinner with an adult purchase (could be during the off season only?). The outdoor pool was great. The fitness center was small. Very nice property! We would stay there again if in that neck of the woods.
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed five star review! We are pleased to learn you enjoyed all the amenities our hotel offers.  In regards to the kids eat for free with an adult offer, we are happy to announce it is a special we have year round! We look forward to a visit again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Stayed here for three nights while attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center. It’s a very easy 7 minute walk there (and they have a map for you for the shortcuts). It is also a mile walk to Disneyland - straight up the street and really easy. The hotel room was nice and there is a coffee shop in the lobby which was great. It was reasonably priced and also on the bus route so you could get to places in Anaheim really easy. There are a ton of restaurants around the area as well as convenience stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are proud of our close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: 4 pleasant nights in room 741. Great room.  Super quiet.  Satisfactory amenities. Has a door between little living room area and bedroom/bathroom. Bath/shower had safety rail in bad location.  Otherwise huge bathroom quite pleasant.   Very clean and nicely cleaned daily.   Wonderful night in king size bed with great blackout curtains.   This hotel room has no windows that open.  Very close to convention center and Disney. The ART transportation picked up a few feet from the hotel and provided frequent inexpensive transportation to Disneyland.    Denny’s and Carl’s Jr. across street.  Blocks from target. Less than a mile to outlet mall at city drive.   Friendly staff.  Fast elevators. Very nicely furnished.    My only complaint was omelets aren’t included with breakfast.  I would
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to let us know about your most recent stay! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed the spacious rooms we have with our separate bedroom and living room area.  We can't wait to welcome you back soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Rolled the dice in this hotel and was pleasantly surprised! Rooms were nice. Updated, clean and quiet. Service was excellent and staff was beyond friendly.  We had the option of driving to the park or taking an Uber. We did both and preferred the Uber as we got in and out of the parks quicker.( no tram, parking garage, etc) Also, parking is $20-$35 at the parks and an Uber was only $5 plus tip each way! I recommend this hotel for those that prefer a more upscale feel , but not a 5 Star location.  Worth a few extra bucks to stay here then a motor inn. Will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying her with us at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. We are extremely thankful for you recommending us to others! We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your next stay with us.  Management

Summary: Bugs in the room. Way over booked Management did not seem to care about their guest. I will not be returning. I wish my stay was better and the staff did what was right and made my stay comfortable and clean.

I stayed here with my husband and our three kids.  We stayed in a suite with two queen beds and sofa bed.   Loved that the there was a wall in between the room and sofa area.  Great Location well located if you are planing on visiting Disneyland as we did.   Staff were super friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I checked in early after that last experience (the one above), and did not expect my room to be ready.  They stored my bags, explained how to get to Disneyworld (even suggesting that it might be faster to cross to the other side of the street for the ART bus pickup), and took my phone number.  The young woman at the front desk was wonderful.  I had rung the day before with some questions and had spoken to her, finding her charming and helpful.  At the check in counter, she exuded the same friendly, positive, helpful personality.  She rang several hours later when my room was available.   When I returned four hours later, I was delighted to find everything ready for me.  The room was exactly what I expected.  Clean, a good size, in great condition, and more than adequate.  I have
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I stayed here with my wife and 2 kids (9 and 4) for 2 nights whilst we visited Disney land.    The hotel is really well located only half a block from the toy story parking lot for Disney.  We stayed in a double queen room which was extremely spacious, comfortable and clean.    Unfortunately one of the kids  was unwell one day and my wife and him spent the day in the hotel room and it was definitely handy having the space and also they ordered room service for meals which was efficient and the food pretty good.  Service was also very good from the reception to the Disney desk.  Overall we were really happy with the hotel and would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly and courteous staff.  My room was very clean and I enjoyed my stay here.
Summary: Great location, friendly and courteous staff.  My room was very clean and I enjoyed my stay here. Easy walk to the convention center, and a good walking distance to many restaurants.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are pleased to learn you enjoyed our close proximity to the convention center and restaurants. We look forward to welcoming you back to the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center soon!  Management

Summary Heading: Horrible front desk, but other then that decent stay.
Summary: Just wanted to say after staying over 5 times here I was very disappointed with the front desk staff.  I requested a early check in after selecting my room on the Hilton honors app. When I checked in at the front desk, my room was not available and neither was any other room for a 2 queen suite. My room wasn’t ready until 730pm that night which was unacceptable.  When i returned to the front desk for my room keys, I was denied my Hilton honors silver member waters and my cookies for my children.  I informed the front desk agent I was a silver member and was still denied  stating I’m not a silver member which I found insulting.  The front desk agent was rude and not helpful whatsoever.  I’m very disappointed in this hotel and this is the second time I received bad service from
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location, amazing service, quiet pool
Summary: We were able to get an early check in and a late check out. Pool was quiet every day until late afternoon when kids returned from Disneyland. Get a fireworks view room on the top floors, they have great views. We were in room 614 and it was perfect. Hotel was quiet and pool was clean and a great temperature for the hot August days. The staff were incredibly accommodating, and very kind. The store on site is only open for a few hours in the morning, so if you need things, grab them in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location, great food, great time
Summary: Stayed here with the family for a Disney Land trip. Having the suite was great as it provided some separation from kids during downtime. Hotel breakfast is awesome and you can stock up for the day. The walk to Disney is easy (about 15 min).
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing review! We are so thrilled to learn your family enjoyed their time here with us! We look forward to your return visit!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: staff here were really helpful and couldn't do enough.  Found interesting that the cheaper end of hotels we stayed in during this trip to the USA gave free water bottles etc, here as at the Garland there was a charge, so don't let the kids drink unless you want to pay when they arrive :)  initially given a room with a carpark view requested a change and got a better view, from 12th floor!  rooms were great, when requested non feather bedding it was not a problem and quickly resolved.  indoor pool requires payment outside however doesn't but not good for serious swimming as busy.   good location, walkable to Disney etc shuttle available at a cost.  Had a good children's swimming ;pool, although not needed I did think when mine were little they would have loved it! got free wi fi
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We booked this hotel within two weeks of taking our trip. The hotel was clean, staff friendly, and situated close to Disney. It was very comfortable for our family. The room was set up such the sleeping area is away from the main door, keeping the hall lights from bothering you while resting. The noise was minimal, almost nonexistent. I would stay here gladly again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us!  We look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I stayed here for a mini- vacation to Disney and this hotel went above my expectations. The staff were super friendly and welcoming, the rooms were very spacious and clean. I can't wait to stay here again! Oh, and the cookies are delicious !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for this excellent five star review! We thank you for your loyalty, and cant wait to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We always stay here when coming to visit Disneyland and have never had a bad experience in our 5+ times. Check-in is always efficient and we always receive a cookie. The rooms are always clean and priced very well for what you are receiving. It is always quiet in the hotel which is nice after a long day.
Manager Response: We are so very pleased you enjoyed your stay here with us at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great family hotel for Disney trip
Summary: We've stayed here before. The rooms are large and well appointed. The pool is kept clean and is usually not very crowded. Great place to watch the Disneyland fireworks.  If you're going to eat breakfast in the hotel, I'd advice ordering from the menu rather than the buffet. The buffet selection is pretty narrow, but gets the job done. Just not a lot of value for your money. The restaurant does close fairly early so don't plan on a late dinner here after a day in Disneyland.  Rooms are quiet and we never once have heard our neighbors in over ten years coming back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. Your compliments of our rooms, pool, location and overall loyalty to our property are greatly appreciated. We look forward to your return visit.   Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Room was clean and comfortable. Staff was extremely helpful and friendly, they treated us like family. Helped us with transportation needs. Enjoyed our stay. Was in a great location to the convention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We couldn't be more pleased to hear you and your family were treated like family.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: A nice, clean place to stay for he money I paid. I only stayed there for two night and don't have anything to complain about. The breakfast buffet had a good selection of food and food and the lobby was quite spacious and nice. People at the front desk were quite friendly and answered many of my question about driving to LA
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your most recent stay. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We hope to welcome you back soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I would not recommend this hotel for the value and service you get it is overpriced. The pool was very disappointing it was something you would find at budget hotel. Also the gym didn’t have much of anything. The parking is 18 night movies on demand is 20 per movie. You can find better value hotel closer to Disneyland that is walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our hotel.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Stayed just one night.  Very friendly service but the hotel itself is old. Airconditioning is old and noisy.  And there are no ice machines. There are many restaurants in walking distance. Reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Comfy hotel, good cookies, helpful front desk staff!
Summary: I was only there for one night on business.  The bed was very comfortable.  In general, the furnishings are somewhat dated but in pretty good shape.  I'm no longer used to staying in hotels which do not have direct USB connections for my electronics to charge, however, as stated, the furnishings are older. Same for the bathroom, somewhat dated. That being stated - I would rather have a very clean room with dated furnishings that modern and not so clean.  The front desk was very helpful and saved me tons of steps to the convention center by showing me how to cut through a side street etc. The hotel is also directly across the street from a Denny's and a short walk to one of my favorite restaurants, Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your return visit!  Management Double Tree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convetion Center

Summary: We stayed here for a night at Disney . Rooms were a great size and we were able to check in early . They are a little dated but not bad. Close to Disney. We had 5 of us so instead of the bus at $5.50 a person took a Uber for $9 each way. No wait and door to door service .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our amenities.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites  by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Room was clean and spacious.  No cookies upon check in or anytime during stay Room service was excellent!  ART bus takes forever from this location. That would be the only reason I would stay somewhere else next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed room service! Sorry to hear about the ART bus, as that is not a common comment.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Fabulous hotel but beware the cookies have nuts!
Summary: The room was huge! Stayed in a 2 queen room and there was a little living room as well as the bedroom. I was not expecting it to be so nice!   Upon arrival (in the middle of the night around 2AM) they still offered us cookies. I had read about the cookies beforehand and was super excited, I was especially surprised they would still have them to offer us at such a late hour. However, beware those who cannot eat nuts like me, there are nuts in the cookies! I was a little dissapointed, there seems to be no but free option for a treat but then again It's not like I was only staying there for the cookies! Overall it was still a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for this Fabulous review! Our suites are great for large families! With having two queen beds, and a separate living room with a sofa pullout large families can really utilize the space. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Very nice hotel and close to Disneyland.  We had two rooms as we took the kids and grandkids to Disneyland.  We paid a little more for the one bedroom corner suite and it was well worth the little extra.  It was a huge room with lots of light.  It was very hot outside and with all the windows the room got hot if we didn't close the shades when we left.  A/C was a little anemic so had a hard time getting the room cold, cool but not cold.  The kids had a one bedroom (not corner) suite that was laid out well, but seemed a little tight compared to our corner suite.    The way the living/sleeper sofa area is designed was outstanding.  The main bedroom had two doors.  One to the living room and the other to the dressing area and toilet.  The way it's laid out people from the bedroom
Manager Response: Thank you for this EXCELLENT detailed review! We are delighted to learn you enjoyed all our hotel has to offer! We look forward to your return!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The lobby is clean, fresh and inviting The rooms are spacious and clean. This hotel is close proximity to Disneyland and surrounding shopping areas. There is a laundromat across the street. Gated parking and ART stop right out in front of the hotel. This was my first time staying on Hilton property and they made a customer. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and all we have to offer! We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Very close to the convention center. Quite a hike to Disney.
Summary: We stayed here in April for a business convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. The rooms were adequate and guest service was fine. It was during a raining/flooding period and the hotel lobby had some issues with roof leaks, but everything else was fine. It just wasn't quite as pretty as it could've been. The main entrance of the convention center is about a seven minute walk, about a full city block, from the Doubletree. If Disney is in your plans, prepare to hike another fifteen to twenty minutes. We're old, so we ubered or hired a cab to take us to the Disneyland hotel, where we could walk into downtown Disney and the park entrances.   The rooms at the doubletree were a little dated and it's ready for renovation. Nothing terrible just a lot of wear and tear over the years
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. We do hope you can come back and see us again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We spent three nights with out niece in tow. Very close to Disneyland but far enough away. Room was comfortable and quiet. Restaurants are weak, but who cares? Have stayed at this hotel several times and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and the time with your niece in town! We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My first stay in this Doubletree.  If it were not for the parking charge of $21/night and the higher hotel fees/taxes associated with staying in Anaheim, this hotel would be more likely to make the first choice cut for our frequent trips. However, for this trip, I was flying and solo, and wanted a hotel that had transportation to Disneyland.  This hotel fit the bill, as the ART stops right at the end of the driveway.  Tickets are purchased at the front desk. $5.50 unlimited trips per day. Some other things to know:  Furnishings are dated, but the king bed room I had was really spacious. Full closet with sliding mirrored doors.  Bathroom was spacious with shelving (and more than 2 outlets), shower had good pressure.  Room had numerous electrical outlets in convenient places.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for this detailed review! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed our ART shuttle, spacious rooms, and the snack and beverage section! We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: When staying in the Anaheim area for either a Disneyland trip or an American Sports Center basketball tournament, we would often book a room at the Doubletree Suites by Hilton in Anaheim.  The rooms/suites are quite spacious for a family of 5.  The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland or you can walk to the Toy Story lot and take the Disneyland bus.  It's close to some excellent restaurants like Ruth Chris and Morton's.  Room service pizza was enjoyed by the family.  The rooms were a tremendous value at half the cost of Paradise Pier Hotel.  Downside would be the restaurant has set times for meals and not open all day ( there was one time we wanted lunch around 2 or 3 pm and the restaurant was closed ).  Otherwise, we always consider Doubletree Suites when visiting
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a loyal guest! We are delighted to learn you and your family enjoy all the amenities our hotel has to offer . We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This was my first time staying at the Doubletree in Anaheim though I have stayed at many other hotels in the area since I am a Disneyland Annual Passholder.  Upon arrival we were greeted and staff were friendly. We were given fresh warm cookies and had no problem getting into our room. The lobby is clean and there is a bar, restaurant, cafe, and shop. The cafe sells Starbucks coffee but it's not an actual Starbucks so they can't make you everything Starbucks can. (I tried to order a coconut  milk mocha macchiato and was told they couldn't do it).   There is nothing fancy or above and beyond for the room. They look the same, are about the same size, and have the same comforts of any other hotel we have stayed at in Anaheim (Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton Inn, Grand Legacy at the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. Please accept our sincere apologies regarding the incidental hold as this is a very significant amount that can impact your stay. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Thank you again for your valuable feedback, we hope you give us another chance to take care of you in the future.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. Everyone jumped on the chance to help us. I wish we could stay here more often. If you are trying to decide where to stay- this is the place! They even let us sneak a few more cookies each day:-)
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! We appreciate your loyalty, it means the world to us! We look forward to your return!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: While preparing for our cruise decided to spend the night in Anaheim I chose this hotel, since I have stayed here before so I know it's a good hotel. As a gold member of the Hilton honors program we were treated very nicely upon our arrival, got there a bit early and was able to check-in. This hotel is centrally located to just about everything in Anaheim area. Even though there's a slight fee for parking at the hotel, you're within walking distance to plenty of restaurants and shops. This hotel is very clean and the staff is always welcoming. Was able to dine at the restaurant in the morning for the breakfast buffet which is always good. If you're in the area I highly recommend staying here hotel is quiet clean and very comfortable you enjoy your stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and the breakfast buffet. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Room was awesome, lots of space. Staff at the hotel were really nice too. Room was very clean when we got there and hotel staff took care of our every need. Hotel is at the far end of the block of hotels so expect about a mile walk to Disneyland. Hotel doesn’t have their own shuttle though, about $9 a person for private shuttle.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are thrilled you were able to use our ART Shuttle.  The nominal fee of $5.50 is definitely worth the convenience. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This is our third stay in Anaheim and the best. The rooms are clean and quiet with a nice touch of a chocolate cookie on arrival which was delicious  Attentive staff and smooth check out. Close enough to Disney and comfortable at a fair price. Enjoyable and would stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! We couldn't be more pleased to learn you this is your third stay in Anaheim at our hotel. We thank you for your loyalty; it means the world to us, can't wait to see you soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This is a great hotel.  I was here on business and the accommodations are outstanding. The front desk was very welcoming and even provided warm cookies!  They have a very nice, quiet, comfortable lounge.  The breakfast buffet is fabulous, eggs, pancakes, waffles etc... very nice fruit / salad bar. This was included with my room.  They also have a nice coffee shop.  Pool area is also nice if you are traveling with families.  The bed was amazing!  Coffee and microwaves in the room. I highly recommend this hotel for the business and family travelers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this detailed review! We are so thrilled to hear you are highly recommending our hotel and we can't wait to have you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary: Family of 4 Stayed in a Suite in April 2018.  Room was great, spacious and clean.  Good location to Disneyland.  You can walk to Disneyland or purchase a bus ticket at the front desk, that picks up right out the front of the hotel.  The restaurant and room service had great food that was really good value for money.  The kids really enjoyed the pool and spa after a long day walking around.  Having a view of the Disnelyland fireworks every night from our room was fantasitc!! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are so delighted your family enjoyed all of our hotel amenities and the view of the fireworks, what a special trip! We look forward to your return!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This hotel is amazing. It’s so close to Disneyland and the convention center, which was perfect for our trip to California. The staff was very nice to us and would always offer us cookies when we walked in.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review.  We are so thrilled that your family enjoyed your stay with us on your California trip.  Next time you back in the area, we hope to welcome your family with more DoubleTree cookies!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Good and comfortable hotel, but low security
Summary: Lucas F Manhattan Beach, California 31 Reviewed 2 days ago Good and comfortable hotel, but low security I came to the hotel for a business trip and stayed in one of its suites.  I'm a Hilton Gold member and was glad about the free breakfast, although I have to say that the hotel options for vegans are really lacking. I was stranded into just eating fruit and bagels with jelly, and given that Anaheim is pretty vegan-friendly, I believe that a Hilton hotel should be doing better. Some ideas for good vegan breakfast options would be a tofu scramble, veggie sausages, non-dairy butter, non-dairy cream cheese, or pancakes without animal products. I was happy about the soy milk though!  The suite was very clean and comfortable - much larger than a typical junior suite at the Ritz or
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, large rooms, great service
Summary: Had 5 family members 17 and up sharing a suite. While tight, suite was nice and housekeeping did great job. Front desk service was great, we got lots of cookies.   Two comments, $15 for breakfast buffet is too much for what they offer (no omelet station for example). Also, do not pay to take Anaheim shuttle to Disneyland. In ml morning it doesn't get you there before crowds. Walk the 20 minutes and you are there.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are thrilled to learn your family enjoyed their suite and the front desk service was great! Regarding the breakfast, we appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The check in went smoothly, only after checkout, we encounter a rudefront desk lady, who wont even give you checkout at 12 pm, insist that our check out time is 11 am not more, and saying “I dont care if you are diamond member, I have rejected 3 diamond members before you”
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This was by far the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed at. Rooms are also spacious and comfortable. Hotel wasn’t overly crowded or noisy and is conveniently close to the Disneyland parking lot and within walking distance of various restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this five star review! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed our spacious and comfortable rooms, along with our close proximity to Disneyland and restaurants. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Hotel location was great, the size was great, check in went smooth, with a nice lady on the front desk, However it is all ruined by a rude frontdesk lady on checkout, refused our request for check out at 12 noon which is normal checkout time, even as their Diamond member, ..... when we check out she didnt apologise or whatever or even say thank you .... what a service!!!  we have to rush and leave at 11, The staffs in restaurant also looks tired and bored....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry we could not accommodate your request. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.We appreciate your business and hope you will give us another chance to take care of you in the future.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Tidy comfortable place to stay. Close to Disneyland . Close to transfer bus stops and handy having guess laundry available. Would have been nice to have a coin machine to change notes but front desk was happy to help.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are happy to learn you enjoyed your stay with us and the close proximity to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location for the Convention Centre
Summary: Stayed here for a company convention.  A really clean place, staff really helpful but not in your face, room was upgraded to larger room.  Bar wasn't too big but again, stayed open as long as anyone wanted.  Breakfast was superb and typically as much as you could manage ! Close to all amenities and restaurants as well.  If you were there to hit Disney then there's buses running or cabs ordered within 5 mins.  Car hire place across the road if needed. Would definitely go back if was at the centre again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this complimentary review! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed our property and close proximity to Disneyland and the Convention Center. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Sorry for the Late review. We stayed here  May 1-2 2018. My arrival began with an EXCELLENT Bellman named David. He was a Godsend. I had 2/3 of a midsized suv filled with luggage & he promptly assisted me in a very professional manner unlike the more elder guy next to him who seemed to dawdle off unwilling to help considering they werent busy at all. I told David I haven't got cash to leave a tip but it didn't phase him he just did his job with a big smile & said dont worry. I was sooo glad i found an atm closeby only abt 8 steps away (he cd have told me but he didnt) i got to tip him cos he went above & beyond with his genuine customer service that I was not just a stat but a person. First interaction affects your entire stay. Thank you so much David! Front desk staff was ok,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the this very detailed review and compliments of our associate David!  We always appreciate knowing that we have met our guests' expectations and that you enjoyed and would recommend our property. We can't wait to welcome you back again!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Thank you for the warm welcome and friendly staff!
Summary: Stayed here for one night and as a gold member we got upgraded to a nice view but unfortunately, the fireworks got cancelled.  Staff are friendly.  It was my son's bday so we were given extra buffet breakfast ticket.  Parking fee got waived as well.  I love this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and your son got a birthday breakfast ticket!. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I stayed at the Doubletree Suites Anaheim for 1 night before visiting Disneyland the next day with my son. It was very clean and nice. We enjoyed the pool, hot tub, and restaurant. And the suite was perfect for us! Very comfy room but the couch was a little stiff. Then it was worth it to park there and just take the bus that came right outside to Disneyland and back. Great trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay.  We are pleased to learn you were able to make use of our ART Shuttle, as it is very convenient and drops off right outside of Disneyland. We look forward to your return visit with your son!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located near Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and clean, the staff is very helpful and there is a help desk where you can buy tickets to Disneyland and download the application. Breakfast is reasonable and free for kids. Good value for money
Manager Response: Thank you for this pleasant review! We are thrilled to learn you bought tickets to Disneyland at our Welcome Center! We hope to welcome you and your family back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Had an issue with the front desk staff and managers! Had to do a breakfast. They told me they couldn’t help me that I needed to call reservations. No one was willing to assist. I got breakfast comped only because I called guest recovery. Notes were on account but front desk gave such a hard time about waiving the charges. Spent over 21/2 hours dealing with this issue. None of the staff was helpful. Me and my mother felt ambushed by the staff because they were questioning everything like I was trying to get a free breakfast when it was something I was supposed to have had originally. Checking in/checking out was horrible. Took an hour for them to finally adjust charges off. The General manager was supposed to call me and have yet to hear from him. I have even attempted to contact
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. Please accept our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations, we assure you this is not the normal at our hotel. Thank you again for your feedback.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We stayed 4 nights while in Anaheim.  Very convenient to many restaurants.  The shuttle to the parks was also timely and reasonable.  The hotel was very nice and the breakfast buffet as a gold member was a nice start to each day
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel and the breakfast buffet!  We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Hilton Diamond member here. I've reviewed many Hilton hotels all over the country and many are lucky to be 3 stars. This hotel is one of the few that's at the top of my list! It's such a nice hotel! The staff are all super friendly and everything is really convenient. We stayed here to get access to Disney and buss stops out front makes that super easy. After 3 nights stay, i have no complaints. Everything is really nice and clean, parking is easy and free, the food is really good although kids DO NOT get free breakfast. $7 to have a bowl of cereal (per kid) was a little dumb but oh well. We learned our lesson and got them food from some place else.   Oh, and the kids really liked the pool and hot tub! Would def come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. As a loyal Hilton Diamond customer, you are among our most valued guests! We appreciate your kind words and we look forward to your return!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: From the moment we walked in, we felt welcomed. This feeling was heightened when we talked to Ty. He was personable and very helpful. Would definitely recommend staying here and enjoying everything this hotel has to offer
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments of our property and our Front Desk Associate Ty. Please be assured that your kind words will be shared by those you mention, specifically. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My wife and I stayed here as part of our honeymoon for 3 nights last week.  A couple of days before I emailed the hotel to ask if there was anything special they could do for my wife as it was our honeymoon.   Mohammed Alkodmani emailed us back really quickly to say that he had upgraded us to have a superior suite and a view of the Disneyland fireworks. We were really pleased and grateful for the generosity and great customer service   Upon check in Jose on the front desk gave us two free coupons for the hotel breakfast buffet as a congratulations.   We loved the suite and the views. Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to anyone who is looking for a Disneyland hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments of our property and our Associates Mohammed and Jose. Please be assured that your kind words will be shared by those you mention, specifically.We pride ourselves in providing the best service to our guests and appreciate knowing we met your expectations.  Congratulations, we hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Be warned--kids do not eat free with HHonors Gold members
Summary: Hotel is nice. Room was clean. No major issues. But when we called ahead to ask about kids breakfast, we were told kids ate free, as long as they were accompanied by an adult, even if those adults were using breakfast coupons (gold status). But when we arrived to breakfast the 1st morning, we were told that was incorrect and that we need to pay for our kids breakfast (ages 2 and 5). Free breakfast for kids was a key factor in our choosing this specific hotel so we felt a little duped. Otherwise, it's a nice hotel. Staff were generally friendly. Parking is $18/day, and it's a 1 mile walk to the Disneyland entrance (took us about 15-20 min). Not bad. We walked it back and forth twice everyday during our 4 day stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests! We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry there was a misunderstanding in regards to breakfast. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights on a business trip. It is quite old and service really average. It seems they care very little.  Laundry was 10$ for a shirt that came back not as expected (creased). When I complained with the front desk they decided to do nothing about it. Not very customer focus and certainly not leaving to the expectation that they would make it right.  On the positive side it is the fact that is really convenient for the Disneyland resort.  Parking is 18$ per night: no way out of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback regarding the service you encountered, we strive for superb customer service. Thank you again!  Management DoubleTree Suites  by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I’ve staid at this hotel and I love it. It’s not to far from Disney and is reasonable priced. There’s a bus that picks you up right outside and will take you back to the parks. I also used Uber a couple times. The rooms are great and they always have a warm cookie for you at check in. Their restaurant on the first floor is enjoyable I’ve eaten there for both lunch and dinner.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed your stay, esspecialy our restaurant and our ART shuttle. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The exterior of the hotel is very nice and the check-in was easy.  However, this is location near Disney, so there are families with young kids who are very active throughout the night and the walls are thin.  The room was spacious, but housekeeping did not properly clean the room.  There was long hair on the sink, floors and tub.  Make sure you check the room for cleanliness!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service.   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I stayed with this hotel starting June 1st and I had a wonderful experience. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Place is clean, pool was clean and staff very friendly. I will always refer this place to friends and families!!🙂
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review!  We couldn't be more pleased to learn you will always refer our hotel to your friends and family! We thank you for your loyalty, it means the world to us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Ananehim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Close to convention center, Disneyland, dozens of restraints.  All within 4 blocks walk.  Very close to major interstate road. Safe, clean area, also not far from Target other stores. Great staff and service!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review!  We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Location is key, especially when it comes to Disneyland, restaurants and the freeway! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I thought I was staying at the other DoubleTree in the area, just down the road and was initially disappointed to not be there, but this hotel and staff were wonderful, just not a lot of nightlife/excitement there.  Beautiful suites and awesome breakfast buffet!!  Highways easily accessed from there, as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our breakfast buffet and staff! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels in this price range I have stayed at
Summary: The Doubletree Suites by Hilton in Anaheim Resort was one of the best stays I've had for hotels in this price range.  The hotel was extremely clean and quiet (ability to pick your own room can help with that), and I received outstanding customer service from all staff resources that I interacted with.
Manager Response: Thank you for this huge compliment! We are thrilled to hear you received outstanding customer service from all the staff, we hope to see you again soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This is a nice hotel with great accommodations.  They have a nice bar area, good food is served in the restaurant.  The breakfast area is also very nice with a buffet or a menu option.  The rooms are large with a comfortable bed and the bathroom is clean.  They offer free WIFI and have a gated parking area for your car. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for highlighting all of our accommodations! We are happy to learn you enjoyed and had a great stay! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel, with a tiny little workout room.
Summary: This is a very nice hotel. I was at the convention center for the week, so staying at the Hilton or Marriot would have been more ideal, but it's only a ten minute walk. The staff was great, and room was always well serviced. The rooftop pool was really nice, but the weather didn't accommodate unfortunately. Rooms are great, and my only big complaint is the extremely small fitness room for such a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a pleasant stay with us and our location was convenient for your needs. It was a pleasure having you with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel, just don’t depend on the Starbucks inside
Summary: The hotel stay was great! It’s clean, convenient and the staff was very friendly. Parking was crazy expensive , but there’s plenty of spaces to park so that’s a plus. We tried twice to get Starbucks down stairs. Once in the afternoon and it was oddly closed. The next time was in the morning. Only one person in front of us, we waited 20 minutes and gave up. The man working didn’t even acknowledge we were there or apologize for the wait. Spent about 5 minutes in the huge line for Starbucks in Disneyland instead .. I would still stay at the doubletree again if the price is right. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to continuously improve upon our guest experience. Please accept our sincere apologies with the service you experienced, as we value each and every one of our guest's time.  We hope to welcome you back!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great accommodation for really good price
Summary: Great room. Great rate. Great experience. Most notable thing was the quality of food and quantity we got for breakfast — price was fair, unlike the price hikes you usually see on room service food in other hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review! We are thrilled to learn you had a great experience! Please come visit again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Choose another HILTON to stay at
Summary: I am a loyal HILTON customer but this hotel should not be a part of their portfolio.  We reported several issue we had when we stayed there such as the AC making a banging noise all night, waited an hour for bedding that should have already been in the room (and still no pillows) and the breakfast service was terrible. We had to wait for our coffee and it was weak and watery.  The food was poor quality for Hilton. We never heard from the Doubletree manager even calling 3 times to follow up.  We finally had to contact the Hilton Diamond desk to get a resolution.  We finally heard from the GM after doing that who stated they are as good as any other Hilton and not sure what the issues were.  That was definitely not the response I was expecting but again not a Hilton quality hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Good stay at the Hilton Anaheim.  Attended for the cda convention.  This is the best value if you are staying for business at the convention center.  This location is also very close to the Disneyland attractons.  Very good value for the location compared to the other hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are happy to learn you enjoyed your stay over CDA!  We are conveniently located a bock from the Convention Center and Disneyland attractions! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We had a typical great experience at the DoubleTree Suites Hotel during our visit at the Anaheim Convention Center.  It is convenient to Disneyland and other restuarants in the area.  Access is easy and not quite in the congestion mass immediately around the ACC.  Clean, friendly service--with a great cookie!
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are so glad to hear it is your typical great experience! We look forward to your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: First time ever at a Hilton affiliated hotel without complementary coffee in the lobby. The gym was way small, only 1 treadmill and 1 weight station. FEES, FEES!!! Add nearly $10/night for tourist and Anaheim fees. Parking is $18/night. Breakfast was $15.95. Ridiculous!!!  This is built for Disney land visitors no doubt. It is within walking distance to the Disney park and Anaheim garden walk. The restaurant inside has terrible reviews on trip advisor so we did not try it.
