Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times and each time was great. The staff is wonderful and the rooms are comfy and spacious! We are here for events at the convention center not Disneyland but who doesn't love watching fireworks at night from your hotel room!
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are thrilled to learn you were able to enjoy the fireworks in the comfort of your hotel room, that is one of our many perks! We can't wait to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Stayed for a week due to business conference.  Front desk was very good and customer focused. Room service for breakfast was extremely fast. Food was tasty with generous portions. Very convenient to Anaheim Convention Center and restaurants. My only complaint was poor customer service focus in bar/grill area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review! We are so excited to learn you had a good experience with customer service and the front desk.  In regards to your customer service in the bar/grill area, we sincerely apologies.  We will look into this with our team, as customer service is of top priortity.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great Anaheim hotel - Doubletree Suites delivers again!
Summary: Fourth visit to Disneyland/ Anaheim and second time at the Doubletree Suites Anaheim - Convention Center.  When we travel to the US we generally stay in Hilton group hotels as we like the choice of sub-brand options and while each has a point of difference or signature element, in our experience they deliver consistently great value, quality and service.  Doubletree's are amongst our favourite and we chose to stay here again over nearby options.  From the warm welcome we received after the long flights from the Australian West Coast, to the comfortable room, (7th floor - thanks very much for honouring the high floor request too!), our multiple approaches to the friendly front desk during our 3 day stay to secure a couple of the famous cookies and the cheerful can-do attitude of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this very detailed review! We are so happy to hear you encountered our cheerful can do attitude from our staff! Please visit us again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This hotel went out of their way to find my wifes engagement diamond that had fallen out of her ring.  They found it, absolutely out of their own good will, and I cannot thank them enough.  Perfect service.
Manager Response: WOW! We are so grateful to have found your wife's wedding ring! We hope to see you again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location
Summary: Big rooms, great for families with kids. Quiet rooms, great for people without kids. Large property space, lots of parking (you pay by the day) and less than a mile to Disneyland. Great hotel. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review! we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: check in was unacceptable it was at 5pm waiting so long because rooms were not ready and then someone messed up reservations and 1 room was down graded from a suite to a standard and the standard was canceled it was a mess
Manager Response: Apologies to hear of your late check-in. The hotel makes every attempt to have the rooms ready by 4 PM. With regards to the room accommodations, the hotel reinstated the cancelled suite in an effort to help fix the cancellation made by central reservations.   Management  Double Tree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Pain to deal with corporate accounts
Summary: Pain to deal with corporate accounts.  The billed my account for a group trip without all of the paper work filled in, and then when I corrected the error have been waiting several weeks to get a refund processed.  Contacted them many times and have repeatedly been told they'll take care of it, but I am still waiting.
Manager Response: Apologies to hear of your accounting issues.  Accounting has advised that a refund has been processed on 04/30/18. It is up to each individual banks on how long it processes the refund.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Three night stay while visiting Disney
Summary: Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful.  Cleaning staff were great too.  We had a suite and it was great with the kids.  Rooms were clean and spacious.  Pool was great you can see fireworks from the pool deck.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your most recent stay! We are thrilled you enjoy all of our amenities! Please come visit again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We picked the Doubletree Hotel and because we had a rebate offer and all I could think about was their fabulous cookies. They did not disappoint! Fresh warm cookies served at checkout And they even gave us extra because we asked. The young guy who checked us in was so super friendly and wonderful and helped us get our bags from our car up to our room. The hotel lobby is just stunning, so gorgeous I can't think of a more beautiful hotel lobby in my recent memory. It feels very luxurious and grand. The room was very clean and nice, the color choices weren't my favorite but it did give a warm feel. We got a queen with a separate bedroom, clean nice. Blackout curtains were VERY GOOD! That's important to me because I'm like a vampire when I sleep, I need it super dark! The bed was
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for this detailed five star review! We cant wait to welcome you back soon! We will save some of our fabulous cookies for your arrival!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Expected average but got much more
Summary: We booked the hotel to be a short walk from Disneyland (which it is 10 mins with two kids aged 6yrs and 8yrs) so weren’t worried about what the hotel was like as it was only to provide a base. Upon arrival, which was very late we were greeted with warm smiles and cookies and told our extra pillows and blankets had been sorted and were already in the room (massive bonus when tired).  The buffet breakfast has a good variety and is reasonably priced and the waitress we had for three days was delightful remembering everything about our order and children.   I would highly recommend the hotel for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such positive feedback! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Stayed on the 19th floor was able to see the Disney fireworks each night. Walkable to restaurants and shopping. Nice restaurant and bar in the hotel. Pool area and general outside area very clean and nice. Would define stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review and selecting the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. Delighted to know all your expectations were met by our accommodations and excited to welcome you back! We look forward to your return !  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I was disappointed with the room and the quality of service at the hotel. The mattress was too soft for my liking and left me with a backache. The bigger issue was with the service. I could not find the room service menu in my room so I went to the front desk to get one. They directed me to the restaurant, who in turn sent me back to the front desk. No one took the initiative to find one. I finally used the restaurant menu to order. They made me feel as though they were doing me a favor by letting me order a takeaway to the room from their menu. Poor service. Limited initiative overall. Again, reflective of the 'i-don't-give-a-damn' attitude most anaheim hotels have.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. Please accept our sincere apologies with the service you experienced.This is not typical behavior as our team strives to deliver exceptional service. We appreciate your business and hope you will give us another chance to take care of you in the future.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: I stayed her for business, they made you feel welcome. The staff was very helpful. It is close to Disney land. We ate in the restaurant 1 night it was very good service was great they made you feel valued. We would stay again if in that area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such kind words about our hotel! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland.
Summary: This is our second stay at this property and we love it b/c it provides two separate sleeping areas (e.g. two rooms) while still being reasonably priced for a family that's dropping hundreds down the street with the mouse.  There are two shuttle stops right out front, so easy to get to the parks.  Also love the free cookies :-)  The only reason I didn't give it the highest marks is the rooms are starting to look a tad tired.  This would not prevent me from staying here again, just may be time for some updating.  Oh and the beds were VERY comfortable which is hard to find in hotels these days!
Manager Response: Delighted to know that you all your expectations were met by our hotel accommodations and staff. Thank you for sharing your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: My favorite hotel for visiting DCA -- lovely hot tub.
Summary: This is my favorite hotel to stay in when I visit Disneyland / Disney California Adventure. There is a hot tub and pool area on the second floor. It's a great place to listen to the fireworks in the evening. The internet is also fast, and they give you a cookie at check-in. It's just the right distance from the parks -- far enough to have nice rooms and an ART shuttle; close enough to be walkable. Room and bathroom were clean; shower pressure was good; shower/tub drains well. Hope to be back again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing feedback! We could not be happier to hear this is your favorite hotel! We are thrilled to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Nothing special. Not horrible. If you are looking for a clean room and a place to shower, this is your place. Overall the hotel was fine. Our check in was delayed and they gave us hard cookies to make amends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Our team takes great pride in providing all of our guests with an amazing stay and I am sorry you thought it was just okay. I hope you will give us a chance in the future to take care of you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is nice but there are no amenaties for guests. No continental breakfast. Neighboring hotels have breakfast for similar or less price. Also, hotel just far enough from park to make inconvenient after a long day of walking. Plus, no shuttle unless you pay. We did eat in hotel restaurant for dinner. Expensive and not good. I would stay elsewhere that offers their guests some perks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback as this helps us to constantly improve upon our guest experience.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This hotel was amazing. Everything was I  walking distance including Disneyland park. From the varieties of restaurants and shopping you had so many choices. The hotel itself was beautiful and the staff was marvelous. I would definitely stay again on out next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Terrific family hotel with great amenities and walk to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for WonderCon. We arrived around 2AM and the front desk was quick and friendly and very sympathetic. Free cookies at the desk - great for the kids. A comfortable restaurant that served decent dinners and a standard breakfast buffet at reasonable prices. The rooms were large and the beds very comfortable. Best was the air conditioner. Hotel air systems are usually so loud and clunky. This was the best hotel air system ever experienced - so far above the rest that other hotel guests also commented in the elevator about its quality. The outdoor pool and hot tub were nicely heated and a great place for kids to make new friends. Would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: On Business - but I wouldn't have known it
Summary: I loved this hotel.  Coming from where I did I didn't pick it for its location to Disney so I wasn't aware of the "family" part of the hotel.  But I stayed here for 3 nights on business.  My room was huge - I wasn't there much but I cannot complain about it at all.  The coffee shop is great - just sad it closes in the afternoon for a bit.  The bar - all the servers there are awesome and it is a great little hideaway to relax with a glass of wine.  And the food was quite good.  If I had only one complaint the little outside seating area outside the coffee shop is the only place for smokers - and it is perfect to sit, work with a glass of wine and I know we are losing rights all over the place and I respect those that do not smoke so I have no issues and appreciate having a

3 Day 2 night stay was Awesome. Staff was super pleasant, accommodations were perfect and we're already planning on staying next year for our Yearly event at the Anaheim Convention Center. Beds were very comfy!
Manager Response: Thank you for this awesome review! We appreciate your kind words and loyalty! We can't wait to welcome you back for your next stay!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Room good but disappointed with the commitment
Summary: Stayed 19th March 2018 - 22th March 2018  Pros - Good big room and comfortable bed  Cons - During Booking requested for higher floor, Step into the hotel again requested for higher floor which receptionist mention no problem will secure after 2pm check in. Return to hotel after 2pm, got the 2nd floor. I was shaking my head and laughing  Secondly, didn't even guide me on the wifi username. Just handle the key and smile have a pleasant day. I tried to key in my last name but fail.   Shouldn't have committed if unable to secure and maybe protocol guidelines when checking in.   Overall i wouldn't say is a bad stay for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. Please accept our sincere apologies for not getting you on a higher floor, and not giving thorough guidance with Wi-Fi.  We appreciate your business and hope you will give us another chance to take care of you in the future.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We were a large group and the rooms sleep 6. We ended up all on the same floor which was very convenient and the two room suites made for great privacy and streamlining of our itinerary. Plus we had a place to gather! It was perfect
Manager Response: Thank you this five star review! We are pleased to hear your stay was perfect, and your large group of six slept comfortably.  Please visit again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This hotel had exactly what we needed as far as layout - 2 double beds in the bedroom and 1 pull-out sofa in the main shared space. The pull-out sofa was okay (medium firmness) but we had to ask for more pillows and an extra cover as my brother claimed it got really cold in that room the first night we were there.   From the hotel, an Uber takes like 2 minutes and costs between $7-15. Walking takes about 20 minutes from the hotel to the park entrances, being that the blocks are long and crossing intersections takes a while waiting for the walk signal. Bring good shoes if you plan to walk back and forth. There was a shuttle bus that wasn’t running on the schedule we required. There’s also public transport and Disney buses that you can take to the nearby Toy Story parking lot,
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed message! We couldn't be happier to learn you enjoyed all our hotel has to offer! Please visit us again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Everything was great. Cleaning was excellent and check in and check out process extremely easy. They also give you warm chocolate chip cookies at check in. It was a great place to stay. Thanks to everyone at the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for our five star review! We are excited to read you think this is a great place to stay! Stay with us again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Overall not bad, just needs some updating in room. Service was good, staff were very kind. The room issues were: tub was all scraped up, trimming looked old and dated, couches were pretty old, and the cookies are always good!
Manager Response: Thank you for this review! We are always looking for ways to approve upon our hotel!  We will have some cookies waiting for your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I was here for a work trip but thought the rooms would have been great for a family visiting Disney. The suites were spacious and very nicely appointed. Hotel is conveniently located, with ample parking. The restaurant was very good and the meeting spaces were bright and had nice common areas.  Helpful staff as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for this terrific review! We are so pleased you enjoyed your work trip with us.  Please come back and visit soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Ananehim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The suite was huge!  It was very clean!  The staff was fantastic.  I do have to give credit to the maids.   I ended up getting sick on the trip, and they were fantastic!  The beds were the standard Double Tree very comfortable.  I always love their beds.  This hotel is also conveniently close to the Convention Center and Disneyland.  An excellent place to stay, and I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this excellent review! We appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I recently stayed here on business. The rooms, hallways and lobby areas were well maintained, and staff were attentive and professional. The fitness area is very limited (two treadmills, one elliptical, and a single weight machine). Good breakfast selection in the buffet, and good service. Nice property with good service. Just wish had better fitness center.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review! We hope to welcome you  back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My suite was like staying at home and the room was very clean. The Crafted Burger was made to perfection and was tasty.  The staff are extremely professional, friendly, and very helpful.  The business area made it easy to print and send documents.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We truly appreciate your feedback- highlighting our staff, business center and the crafted burger! We look forward to welcoming you "home" soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great stay, great prices, great location
Summary: As the title states we had a great stay here! A large group of Travel Softball girls, with their families, stayed several weekends at the Doubletree Suites in Anaheim and we could not be happier with the stay. The breakfast was great for softball girls that had several games; good amount of protein plus carbs to keep fuel going! The rooms are big enough to hold all their gear plus the families and the location is great; right off the freeway!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience! We are delighted that you and your softball girls were happy with their stay! We hope to welcome you back for mat future stays!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Stayed here this past weekend for a trip to Disney. I'm a Hilton Honors member so I wanted to use my points and this seemed like the best option.   The good:  The hotel is very clean, rooms are spacious and well-appointed. Bathrooms are also nice with plenty of counter and shelf space. I liked that there was plenty of room to put toiletries without having them clutter everything.   The Disneyland Welcome Center came in quite handy when the Disneyland app kept glitching and wouldn't allow me to purchase tickets to the park online. Staff there was quite knowledgeable and friendly.   The bad/ugly  The sound insulation is basically non-existent. Neighbor gets a phone call at midnight? You're gonna hear their phone ringing AND their half of the conversation. Small children running
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience. In regards to the Wi-Fi, we have recently upgraded our Wi-Fi and we apologize for any inconveniences as we are still working through the glitches. We appreciate your business and hope you will give us a chance to take care of you in the future.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Only stayed one night service was excellent. Ate at the hotel bar food was exceptional . I had the ribeye cooked to perfection. Bar stafff very curtious front desk staff exceptional.the rooms were clean and very spacious and comfortable . In all enjoyed my stay highly recommmened.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and also highly recommending our hotel! We are so excited to hear your bar food and ribeye was cooked to perfection, along with our bar and desk staff being courteous! Please come back and visit us soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel!  We had 2 kids along so I booked a suite with a living room w/pull-out sofa and a bedroom w/2 queen beds. The living area also had a desk w/chair and a tv. The bedroom had the beds plus a chair and another tv. The bathroom was well-appointed. Dining out with a 5 and 7-year-old is not always easy and we noticed the "kids eat free" sign in the lobby (actually spotted by the 7-year-old).  We had been driving for several hours and chose to take advantage of the offer.  The kids' menu had good options for them plus crayons etc. There were also pleasant options for the adults (including a cocktail menu--much needed after the drive). The breakfast buffet in the morning was also a big hit with the kids (a pancake machine!!) and plenty of options for
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review and selecting DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center.  We are so thrilled you and your family enjoyed your stay with us, especially the part when your children enjoyed our "kids eat free" menu! We are also thrilled to learn every member of our staff was pleasant and helpful, it means the world to us! We look forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary: Every time I visit Anaheim this is the hotel I chose. Their staff and amenities are perfect. Always helpful and friendly. Clean nice upgraded rooms! Everyone from the cleaning ladies to the bar staff to the front desk counter had amazing attitudes and great customer service skills. Always a good time when I'm at my home away from home for business. thank you!
Manager Response: Wow! We are sincerely so happy to hear so many compliments regarding your most recent visit! We can't wait for your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel near Anaheim convention Center
Summary: The Double Tree Anaheim is a great hotel near the convention center and Disneyland. The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were spacious and clean. In room dining was very good and not too expensive. I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so excited to hear you will be back again! We can't wait!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We Love This Hotel! My family and I having been staying here for Disney trips since 2011. The location is perfect.  It’s right down the street from Disneyland. The closest beach is only a 20 minute drive. It’s close to restaurants and dining. There’s also a target right up the street and who doesn’t love target!? The rooms are always clean and the staff is always so courteous! The rooms are spacious and the beds are so comfortable!   Apart from this long overdue review,I wanted to write this review especially for our guest room attendant GRACIELA!  Graciela, you made our stay the best one we’ve ever had here! Thank you so so so much for your hospitality! It is so humbling to see how much pride you take in your work. The dog made out of towels that you made shows that you like to
Manager Response: Thank you for your score of A++ score! We also want to thank you for your loyalty and the kind words regarding Garciela! We look forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I stayed here on a family vacation, and these guys do a great job at making guests feel welcome. The DoubleTree chocolate chip cookies were always warm and available.  As with most other Anaheim properties, this place charges some $20 for parking.  Also, I had inquired about cancelling past the cancellation deadline (without actually cancelling) but somehow this turned into a call during which I was told the reservation may have been cancelled and I may need to pay a higher rate when checking in.  I did not appreciate that and this kept me from giving the property a "5" review.

Outstanding clean comfortable hotel with helpful staff. Great beds! Close to Disneyland parks. We walked easily. Easy access from freeways and parking was reasonable. Pricing of rooms was ok but well worth the difference between lower priced motels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this five star review! We look forward to your next visit with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention Center

Summary: The check-in was very quick and the front desk employees were very professional. My room was very spacious and clean. Housekeeping added a special touch by displaying the towels nicely as well as the toilet paper and kleenex. The tissue was folded nice and declaratively. I couldn't see any layers of dust anywhere like I have found in other hotels.   My only complaints would be that the couch looked worn and there's carpet in the larger rooms. But I would still recommend this hotel and found it to be a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review! We are thrilled to hear you had a nice check-in and the complimentary words regarding housekeeping. We look forward to your next stay.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location for Anaheim convention center activites
Summary: I stayed here for a business convention and was very pleased with the location. It was close to the convention center and readily accessible restaurants for me to choose from.  Do not go to the gas station across the street, they take advantage of the location. Staff was very friendly and filled all my needs while I was staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review! We are thrilled to hear you were pleased with our close location to the Convention Center.  We hope to welcome you back for your next business convention!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Found a great place for my family to stay for our Disneyland Vacation!  Very close..walkable but is about 20minutes and other options like the bus can get you there in less time for cheap and picks up right outside the hotel  Hotel Clean and taken care of.  Staff was nice, friendly and helpful.   Rooms Clean and kept up but yet still feel a bit dated.   Only downfall is small apartment fridge and no real eating area other than a small desk in the room.    Pool: I believe is heated and has a hot tub. Open til 10. Couldn’t have been to cold lots of people out till then in Jan 60 degree nightly weather   Tip: pool view 626-628 will get you daily fireworks 9:30 at night from Disney   Food On site restaurant was ok.  Free Breakfast buffet with our Hilton Honors voucher was good. Kids
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed review! We look forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights with our 4 kids during our Disneyland trip. The hotel was beautiful and the staff was inviting. The room was the perfect size for the 6 of us. This hotel is a great value for large families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your most recent stay! We are thrilled to hear you and your family enjoyed your four night Disneyland trip. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention Center

Summary: Stayed with friends on our New Year's trip to Disneyland.  We like staying here because it's close to the park, on a bus line with bus stop right outside hotel, and clean and comfortable. Rooms are large!  Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! Also, thank you for being a loyal guest to us here at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center, we appreciate the loyalty. We are excited for your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great for our first family trip to Disneyland
Summary: On the Disney bus line about a mile away.  We had a room on the 5th floor where we could watch Disney fireworks from our room.  Bus passes available from front staff.  Can buy for less for multiple days, but we weren’t aware of this until we’d bout 2 days of separate passes.
Manager Response: We thank you for this kind review! We are thrilled to learn you and your family had a great time.  Please visit us again soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Sorry, I must say that we do not feel this hotel appreciated our business or welcome us as Hilton Honors member.  We did not receive any benefits for being a member.  At check in, we did not receive a friendly welcome.  We asked for 1pm check in at the time of booking, call centre agent told us it would not be a problem.  When we arrived at 1:30pm, Front desk staff turned us away.  She did not mention or offered us to leave our luggage with bell person until we asked her if this hotel has the option or we have to load everything back into our car.  We asked if she can give us some general information about the surrounding area, what the hotel has to offer and if we can purchase attractions tickets and for  Disney Land at the hotel? She said "Yes, and the people at ticket desk

Friendly staff, nice comfortable lobby & hotel rooms. On-site Starbucks, gift shop, bar & restaurant. Quiet, relaxing environment. We did not use many amenities, but there is a pool & fitness center. On-site parking for a daily fee. Though Disneyland is a mile walk, there is a FREE Disney shuttle from the Toy Story parking lot which is only 1-1/2 blocks away. Much better option than the city's shuttle which costs money & makes numerous stops. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this very complimentary review.  We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management Double Tree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Well, you can't give a five-star rating to a Hilton, but this one actually gets five stars on service alone. I can't say enough about this staff--from Ashley, to Caesar, to Issam the shuttle driver, we couldn't have asked for better and more personalized, friendly service.  From our shuttle from the OC airport to our request to store our baggage for a day, and then an extra shuttle to the train station, we were treated like royalty.  The room was clean and comfortable. I don't think our room had one of the new mattresses, but it was fine.  We will be making this our regular stay when in OC and taking the train, on our annual Christmas visit.  Thank you staff at Doubletree by Hilton. You are awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this review! We are thrilled to learn Ashley, Caesar, and Issam displayed our friendly service! We look forward to your next stay with us.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Close to Disney Land- Luxury Hotel
Summary: The suites are of good size, 2 separate rooms- lounge and bedroom. Accommodated family of 4 well, includes fold out couch. Top location 10 minute drive to Disney Land and shuttle at your door. Walk to Shops/food close by.
Manager Response: Than you for your kind words.  We appreciate your loyalty with us here at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center, we look forward to your return.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Very clean, comfortable quiet room, and bathroom. Refrigerator, coffee and microwaves included. Self-parking for a fee is also convenient. Very good warm chocolate chip cookies offered during stay. Location is less than 1 mile to Disneyland Resort and close to several restaurants including onsite dining.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review!  We are excited to learn you enjoyed your stay and the close proximity to Disneyland. Please return soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: This was my first time reserving a two room suite when alone and I must say it turned out to be one of the most delightful stays I've had in recent years. I would definitely stay at this hotel again. Aside from a slightly worn sofa,  which is the only four star versus five star rating I would mention, the room was clean delightful well laid out the beds were exceptionally comfortable the pillows were great the staff was humorous and positive and the breakfast was delightful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your positive delightful experience! We are happy to hear the staff was humorous and you enjoyed our comfy bed and pillows! Please visit again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Good place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: My kids and I stayed here for a couple of nights as we were visiting Disneyland.  The staff are friendly and helpful and the property is very well maintained.  Our room/suite was a good size and housekeeping was good.  My only reason for not giving 5 stars is that the decor looks a little dated and some furniture and fixtures looked a little bit scuffed.  Perhaps time for a refurbishment?
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are always ready with open ears to new suggestions.  We hope for your return visit.    Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: We loved this place - we arrived very late and were greeted and assisted promply.    The Hotel is beautiful, The staff is excellent and The location is fantastic.  The staff assisted me with my baggae storage while we visited Disneyland and helped us arranhe transportation.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are so thrilled to learn you loved our hotel and the staff was excellent to you.  Please visit us again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Excellent stay!  Long walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Wonderful, four night stay here the week of Thanksgiving 2017.  Walked to Disneyland every day from here.  Room was well appointed with excellent toiletries, very clean, and a cozy bed.  Breakfast buffet was top-notch, and hotel staff were super friendly.  Liked the size of this hotel better than the massive Hilton nearby.  Much easier to get to room.  Property was very quiet.  Slept very well.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your Thanksgiving week with us! We are pleased to read you enjoyed our top-notch buffet, clean and cozy bed, and our super friendly hotel staff! We can't wait to welcome you back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My family stayed at the Doubletree in December, 2010, and always hoped that we would return some day. To celebrate our daughter’s graduation from Year 12 we decided to return this year.   In seven years, not much had changed. The staff were still courteous and friendly. The welcome cookies were still delicious- especially after a 14 hour journey! Each morning we enjoyed the buffet breakfast in Agio Restaurant. On our previous trip, our waitperson was Gloria who was just fantastic. Again, Gloria was there to greet us this time as well and, as always, her service was impeccable. Similarly, Josh in the concierge was very obliging and always wished us a good day (not g’day) as we embarked on our daily adventures.  Our room was on the Disneyland side and we could see the fireworks at
Manager Response: What an amazing detailed review! We are so happy you were able to come back after seven years to celebrate your daughter's graduation! Even more happy to learn you were welcomed back by Gloria and Josh with their impeccable hospitality! We look forward to your return visit here with us.  Management DoubleTree Suite by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: My best friend and I stayed here for three nights in September 2017.  We stayed for the proximity to Disneyland - the hotel itself is about an hour from LAX and Downtown LA.  The shuttle bus operates outside of the hotel (on the street, not directly from the front door) every 15-20 minutes. Our bus ran late, but it was worth it as it was about 40 degrees celsius with extraordinary humidity the day we were there and the bus was air-conditioned and mostly empty.  The hotel itself was clean - my best friend and I had a double bed each in a separate bedroom from a very spacious living area. The restaurant in the hotel was lovely and reasonably priced, but there are a few other places to eat in close vicinity - we went to the Denny's across the road one of the nights and that was
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for this detailed review about your recent stay! We are thrilled you had an amazing stay with us, we look forward to your return visit. We will make sure to save some of our warm cookies!  Management DoubelTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention- Center

Summary: Overall experience was very good. Clean rooms, great bar and friendly staff. The cleaning service was great. Every day the room was prepared like it was our first day. Location to Disney Land was superb. A lot of amenities around the area to make the stay perfect. Definitely go to Roy's.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We couldn't be more excited to learn you had a very good overall experience! We like to hear all of our amenities made your stay perfect. Please return soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Home Base for Disney and the OC
Summary: Beautiful property!  Staff was professional and efficient.  Used ART for one day at Disney - good but a bit of a wait.  Breakfast buffet was perfect, the servers were consistently friendly and started each of our days with a smile.  Parking was easy, slight glitch with the pass on our last morning but that is our only complaint.  Good location for seeing all of the area - beaches and Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed five star review! We are so excited to learn you enjoyed our properties breakfast, staff and the location of our beautiful beaches and Disneyland! We hope to welcome you back very soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: 2 room suites are great for families here.  Very clean, well maintained hotel.  Close to Disney, and dining options.  ART shuttle is separate, and provides easy transport to the park if you don’t want to walk it.  The hotel restaurant is good.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear your family enjoyed their stay with us! We pride ourselves on having great location, food, and service.  Please come back again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: First Rate Hotel Near Disneyland, Knott's and the Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: If you're looking for a reasonably priced, for the area, upscale hotel near the above mentioned tourist and business trip destinations the DoubleTree Suites by the Convention Center is worth considering. About a seven minute walk through various hotel parking lots gets you to the Convention Center and shuttle busses get you to Disney and Knott's.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review! We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with the local attractions of Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, and the Convention Center.  We look forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Nice quiet hotel in safe business area
Summary: Great little hotel that is close enough to Disneyland (10-15 mins by car) to be convenient, but far enough away that you avoid all of the gouging that goes on next to the park. It is located one block away from the freeway, so there is easy access to wherever you want to go. Free hot cookies help make the check-in great, and the service staff were very accommodating.The hotel is located in the middle of a business area, so it is clean and safe. The hotel is surrounded by lots of little restaurants. The only thing to be aware of is that the self parking for a large vehicle is limited. We have a large pickup and it was worth the extra money to use the Valet service so that they could figure out where to park it at night when most of the stalls are already full.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this detailed five star review! We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The hotel is called the Doubletree Suites but did not provide a suite room for our stay. The restaurant is nothing special and seem to be always deserted. The room we had was adequate for our stay because we were primarily there for Disneyland and only wanted a place to sleep during our stay. I expected more.

It was a perfect  place to stay we were very close to Disneyland  and they also had a great gift shop for the little extra things we might need before going to Disneyland the staff was the best vey kind and so helpful  the rooms were clean   I would Definitely recommend this hotel to all
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending this hotel! It means the world to us that you felt we are a perfect place to stay.  We hope to see you back next time!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: It was the first time we stayed here and It was a great experience.  I love a two room suite and it didn't disappoint.  The bathroom is not in the bedroom or in the living room so it made it private for showers, doing hair, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your stay! We couldn't be happier to learn you experienced a great experience! We hope you become a loyal Hilton member and come visit us soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Room did not equate to $ paid.
Summary: Room did not equate to $ paid. I am sure that u can find a bigger “bang for your buck” elsewhere. One lamp was the only source of light in the bedroom. Suite just didn’t seem to flow right. Not large enough.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments.  We do apologize that you felt the room didn't equate to the money you paid and were expecting. We hope you will give us another try the next time you are in the area.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: The General Manger could care less
Summary: Two months ago my family and I stayed at this hotel. The departure experience was very poor.  I'm a life time Diamond member (over 1500 nights in Hilton properties during the past 14 years). I sent an email to Mr. Neilson the GM. Never heard back from him or anyone else. I shouldn't be surprised. His lack of leadership has been transferred to his staff. I experienced  it at departure!

Our stay at Double Tree was great.  Breakfast buffet was always ready and the food was fresh and hot.  The room was tidy and just the right size.  It was nice having a suite.  The bathrooms would be great if there were two sinks.  Overall, experience was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your stay with us here at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. We are so happy to learn your overall experience was great! We look forward to your return visit.   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary: Cleanliness of the room was not what we expected to match the price paid. Overall appearance of the hotel was very good. The staff was friendly and accommodating. The view from the room was good. Hopefully this review will help in improving the room condition
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We do take each and every guests opinion very seriously. We are super thrilled to hear the staff was friendly and accommodating! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Your phone is your room key!
Summary: The room and hotel was average. I always take a damp white wash cloth and and wipe down certain areas of the room. My room was CLEAN!  My only issue was the room key. At check in, I was not told my phone would be my room key. I would have opted for a standard room key. Instead, I wasted time trying to get my phone set up as the key.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, it is so important to us.  It is very excellent to read your room was CLEAN! We take pride in our cleanliness.  We look forward to your next visit.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Love this Hotel. Second year we have stayed here. Clean comfortable room, nice staff. Short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. Pretty close to Disney land. Rainforest Cafe in the area and Tiffey's Cafe also a couple of steak places close to the hotel.
Manager Response: We love that you love our hotel! We are extremely lucky to have such close proximity to Disneyland and the Convention Center! We can't wait to have you back again next year for Blizzon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My son and I participated in the Disney run.  The location was a little far to walk but it was walkable. Bus service to the start was great. Bus back to the hotel was good as well. Overall I would stay again. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to share  your most recent stay with us! We are so excited to hear you will be back again, that means so much!  We look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The rooms were beautiful and very clean.  I especially loved that there was a "bedroom" and "living room" separation.  Another great perk, the Disneyland shuttle stops right in front of the hotel, and you can purchase the shuttle ticket from the hotel front desk.  The staff were all exceptionally nice, and efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this amazing five star review! We are so excited to learn you loved the room, and our staff! We look forward to your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Poor customer service. Lost me as a customer.
Summary: Due to poor experience with hotel staff, I will not be returning to this hotel. Hilton Honors was able to resolve my billing issue but damage done with poor customer service. Some staff members need to go through training again
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to constantly improve upon our guest experience.  Please know this type of experience you encountered is the not the norm.  We hope you will give us another chance to take care of you in the future.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We made a mad dash to DL after a long conference in downtown LA...this hotel was just what the mood and spirits needed. Clean, friendly staff and did I mention the cookies....we even were offered cookies on our way to DL which made the perfect snack at about 12 noon:)

First, let me say that we ended up at the Doubletree because of a horrific experience with a third party booking site that shall remain nameless (rhymes with schmotelsdotcom) canceled our reservation at another hotel after a "misunderstanding" that may or may not have been due to their call center being located somewhere far away where English is not their primary language.  Anyway... This was a runDisney/federal holiday weekend, so everything was booked and mega pricey. Not Doubletree. I was able to get a room about three weeks out, for a VERY reasonable price, all things considered. Ahead of arrival, I called to make arrangements to have my niece be able to check in ahead of me, as my flight arrived 5 hours after her arrival. The Front desk staff could not have been more
Manager Response: WOW! What a complimentary review! Thank you very much for taking the time to share your recent stay with us! We are so happy to hear how Roger went out his way to be helpful and accommodating during your visit.  You have reflected on so many aspects of our work that means the most to us at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center.  We look forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: I typically book at a Doubletree knowing that I'm going to be getting good service, nice clean rooms, and a quiet atmosphere. We needed it after a weekend away for a convention in Anaheim, and I was satisfied with the stay. The staff members were kind, helpful, and very energetic. They always greeted us and anyone that walked through the door, and wished us a good day when we left.   The rooms themselves were more spacious then expected. The queen suite gave us plenty of area to roam about and store our luggage. We know the rates were increased because of the convention, but we didn't feel like we were ripped off on the pricing. And kudos to the cleaning staff for making our stay more enjoyable! The towels were transformed into elephants and seashells throughout thee room and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this detailed review of your recent stay! We are so happy to hear your a loyal guest.  Also very pleased to hear that our staff members were kind, helpful and very energetic! We look forward to your next stay at the DoubleTree.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This is the second time I've stayed with this hotel, and as my first experience was great, so was my second. Service at the front desk was exceptional! Room was well together, neat , and clean.   I would definitely come back! Not to mention the cookies are amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here with us!  We are thrilled to hear your first experience was great! Now come back soon so we can make your next stay with us is just as exceptional!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great if going to Disneyland. Customer service needs improvement.
Summary: Room was fantastic, asked in advance for a high floor room and that is what I got. Pretty sure we were upgraded as well. Hotel was clean in both the rooms and common areas. Check in staff were friendly but not as professional as I would expect from a Hilton Branded hotel. As a hotel manager myself I expected more from a hotel of that class. Me and my wife had 2 large suitcases and 2 small suitcases a back pack and some other items which we had to carry from the car park and not once did the concierge offer to help us even when we walked into the hotel 2 of the reception staff plus the concierge that was on were chatting amongst themselves, they even looked up at us and went back to continue chatting while we pushed all our luggage towards the elevator. A fellow guest was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. On behalf of our staff, we would like to extend our sincere apologies for your recent experience. We strive the provide the finest personal services and we are so sorry you didn't receive that on our end. We will address this with our staff.  We hope you will restore your faith with us and give us another opportunity to stay within the Hilton family.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: This hotel was fantastic for our business / family trip!  It was close enough to walk to Disneyland and California Adventure.  The staff was fantastic and very helpful with any questions we had.  The on site restaurant had a wonderful breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: Thank you for this Fantastic review!  We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Convenient for Anahim Convention Centre,safe and clean
Summary: Good coffee in the lobby.  Didn't try the breakfast.  Bar snacks and drinks in the evening were very good.  Pleasant staff, nice pool.   Would stay again here.    Review by purple_traveller - a Hilton Honours Silver member.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write about your recent stay! We are even more thrilled to hear you will be back again! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Staff Excellent but Hotel looking outdated
Summary: Firstly the reception and cleaning staff were friendly and always welcoming even over the busy Blizzcon convention. But the hotel itself needs some major renovation the room we had 708 was clean but looked old at the same time, All the furniture looked like it had come from the 70s era. Also the one thing that needs changing is the cafe it closes just after lunch so if you need a Starbucks coffee it’s a 10 minute walk to the Hilton Hotel at the convention centre. I am afraid to say next year for me it will be a different hotel until they update this one.

They got my accommodations wrong, the staff did not resolve my issues, and they failed to accommodate a handicapped boy who wanted to use the pool.  The only bright spot was Zack the bellhop, who was attentive and offered to move everything if we were to be relocated to another room.  He was understanding, patient and very accommodating especially since we had a wheelchair-bound child.  They had a pool lift that was not adaptable to be used by a child.  The room was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: The hotel and staff were phenomenal!!!  Everything was clean and the food and drinks were on point.  If I return to the area this will certainly be my hotel of choice.  Thank you Hilton for never dissapointing!!
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for this phenomenal five star review! We thank you for being a loyal guest to all Hiltons! Can't wait for your return!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Great front desk staff. Helpful polite and professional. Gym was ok. Room was very comfortable and wifi good. Shuttle bus to Disneyland is right outside the door.  Carina was charming at breakfast and it was a relief more than anything to know that as a Gold Member there were no qualms about having a free breakfast. The chef made me poached eggs and they were good. I found it a little strange that if you wanted an omelette you had to pay $3.50 more but I thought overall the breakfast was more than adequate and in my opinion this hotel is much better than the Hilton just around the corner .
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed review!  We are thrilled you had a great experience with the front desk, yourroom, our ART shuttle, and breakfast! We hope to see you soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention- Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel for business and leisure
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel with my family when visiting Disneyland and also when traveling for work, this hotel site is one of the best in the area, it is always immaculate, staff are so friendly and helpful, and plenty of shops and restaurants close by when needed, my family and I love staying here, I recommend to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for recommending our hotel and staying with us for leisure and business purposes! Your loyalty means the world to us. We look forward to your next stay!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The 2 nights we stayed at this hotel was a gift from our children.  I was a little concerned with it being so close to Disneyland but didn't need to be.  The hotel was pretty easy to find.  Reception area was clean and the front desk offered us cookies.  The room was very nice.  Large, clean with a sitting area, refrigerator and coffee machine. Our room looked out over the pool and we were able to see the fireworks at Disneyland.   Toilet and shower were separate from the vanity.  That can be good or bad.  Very large toilet and shower room.  No night light in that area which drives me crazy.  I hate turning on the overhead lights to use the toilet at night.  It was a double vanity with lots of counter space.  Deposit held was $100.  Parking $18.
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed review! We are happy to hear your gift from your children was a pleasant experience.  We hope to have you back again in the near future!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location for the Anaheim convention center
Summary: Excellent experience all around. The staff is helpful and friendly, the room was fresh and clean, the restaurant food and service we're very good. When I travel on business DoubleTree is my first choice, so I have stayed at many DoubleTree properties - this is by far the best.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty to DoubleTree! We are proud to hear your experience is always excellent all around! We very much look forward to your return visit!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The stay was average, could have been better if they acknowledge that you're a Hilton member. Normally when you arrive they greet you with a goody bag as well as the information for you Hilton member points. Best part of the stay was the breakfast. It was delicious!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our delicious breakfast! We hope to have you again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: They do not care.   Change the flag!
Summary: No one working there seemed to care. They were just cashing a check.  Except, Josh, the bellman.  The American flag was faded and torn.  No one cared.  That was the case overall.  The phone rang forever at the room service, if they even answered.  The coffee pot did not work right.   I question the cleanliness too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I reserved a room at this hotel due to its good location.  My room was at the second floor and it was very noisy at night due to an event in the hotel main hall that included use of loud music.  It was impossible to sleep.  I talked to the hotel staff and they did not offer any alternative (other rooms...).  The staff lacked minimum professional behavior.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: One of the better hotels in the area.
Summary: Clean rooms that are good sized, comfortable bed, attentive staff, plus easy walking distance to Disneyland. This is the third hotel I've stayed at in the area and hands down the best, especially at the price point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your complimentary review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center.  We appreciate knowing that we have met our guest's expectations and you enjoyed our room, attentive staff and our close proximity to Disneyland.  We look forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We have a one year old and found easy access to all needs with this hotel location. We ended up with a room that faced the direction of Disneyland so we actually could see the fireworks at night. Pretty cool!   WALKABLE: Exiting the hotel and turning right on S Harbor, Target was a safe, sidewalk friendly 20min walk, stopping off for Joes Italian Ice on the way back to the hotel.  Exiting the hotel and turning left on S Harbor, Disney was an easy 20min walk, stopping off at 7-11 convenience store for some last minute snacks and "need-ums."  ROOM: I really apprecitated being able to close the bedroom off entirely, making a safe area for our little guy to roam about. Coffee station, shelves for food, mini fridge, table and chairs made life's easy for us.   Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback regarding the amenities of our property. Hopefully you will be able to return in the near future.  We look forward to having you back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland with Quick Transport
Summary: We stayed here for our family Disneyland trip and we couldn't be happier. The hotel is ~1 mile from Disneyland and you can catch bus (can purchase tickets for the bus at the hotel) right in front of the hotel. Round-trip transportation is included in the purchase and we experienced no issues at all.  The hotel is nice and clean and the staff is very welcoming. The suite had separate living room and two queen beds in the bedroom. The couch in the living room can also pull out into a bed. The bathroom was fine and was pretty much as you would expect. Bed were comfy and there was plenty of space for our family of four.  Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star detailed review! We are happy to hear your family enjoyed all the amentites our hotel has to offer. We are looking forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Very clean rooms,clean facilities nice and comfortable,restaurants has great food  The service staff very friendly  is people always available for yours needs  Great hotel  rooms are big very reasonable price  great location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  We look forward to your next return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for close proximity to Disneyland. It is a bit of a walk, and too far to walk back to after walking all day in the amusement park.  The beds were amazingly comfortable. The staff at the counter was very helpful.  Parking was easy and 24 hour accesible.  All in all, it was very good for the price, a laundromat is across the road if you’re here for a week, same as two fuel service stations.  It was a very pleasant experience staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We do have a ART Shuttle that can take you to and from Disneyland for the next time for a nominal fee which runs every twenty minutes.  We are thrilled to hear it was a very pleasant stay, and hope you return soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: This hotel is about a mile from Disneyland.  There is a shuttle every 20 minutes which takes about 15-20 minutes to get to the parks.  The service was incredible and the breakfast was a full breakfast buffet with hot and cold food.  I highly recommend this hotel for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for this five star review! We are happy to hear you were able to use our shuttle to get to Disneyland.  Our close proximity to Disneyland makes it that much more enjoyable. We are thrilled to hear you will be recommending us, we very much look forward to your next stay.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: We stayed in Double Tree Anaheim for 5 days to visit Disneyland. My wife and myself were impressed with the room size and the service. The breakfast was good quality. I would recommend this hotel to my friends.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for recommending our hotel, that means everything. We look forward to your family coming back soon to stay with us here at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Awesome staff, close to Disneyland, and clean rooms
Summary: Just have to say, this was the first time I had stayed at a Doubletree, and it was a great experience! The evening staff was awesome they could spot us cookie fiends coming from a mile away. They were always helpful and pleasant. The rooms were clean, but the beds were a little uncomfortable, hence the 4/5. It's close enough to Disneyland to walk, just about a mile from the entrance, and was pretty quiet. I'd stay there again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about your recent stay.  We are so thrilled to hear you had a great experience! We like to think our front desk team is top notch ;)! We can't wait for your return visit!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My family and I were there for a quick 3 night stay for Disneyland.  Hotel and staff were wonderful.  Not to mention our housekeeper was outstanding.  Room was exceptionally clean and took care of all the tiny details.  I would def stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this five star review! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your 3 night stay with us! We look forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: On 2 hours of sleep and having been turned down by Marriott for only having a foreign credit card (we had already paid for it), my wife and I and our 4-year-old devil staggered our way in here, where we were greeted by three lovely ladies at the desk. Before we even paid for our room, Diana handed our little boy a Lion King sticker, which he's obsessed with (he made us sit down and watch it with him as soon as we got to our room), Maria gave him a coloring book, and they both kept offering him cookies while the patient and sassy manager, Arianna, gave us the king suite for a very reasonable price and no hassles. Hands down the best hotel experience I have ever had.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your stay with us! We are so happy to hear our front desk team Diana, Maria, and Arianna were able to make your stay so memorable. Please stay with us again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Old Dated Rooms.matress very Old Sinking in. No slippers or Robes.or Qtips or toothbrushes. Old Sofa. Bad staff at Front desk.Not Treated as a hilton Honors member. Was given Room Not for Hilton Honors member!! Im very disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights, room was clean. They have a gift shop and a Starbucks. You get complamentory cookies that are amazing. Have a shuttle that takes you to Disneyland. Best hotel in the area you can stay at.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this five star review! And thank you for the compliment that we are the best hotel in the area. We look forward to your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention Center

Summary: We stayed here for a family vacation to visit Disneyland, Angels stadium and the ocean (short drive) and it was a great location for all 3! Hotel staff and rooms were excellent! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this five star review! We are so happy you and your family enjoyed your vacation with us! We look forward to your next visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention Center

Summary: The staff members at this hotel were exceptional - they exceeded my expectations. The breakfast buffet is not free, but it was pretty good food - as good as it gets for hotel breakfast buffets.   I had a few issues with the cleanliness of my room (coffee maker had not been cleaned out and bugs in the sink). However, I would still recommend this hotel because I think it was a beautiful property overall.
Manager Response: What a wonderful compliment to hear our front desk exceeded your expectations.  That genuinely means so much to us. Thank you for this review, we look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our recent stay at the hotel while visiting Disneyland.  I was afraid that it would be too far from the attractions, but it all worked out very well.  We made use of a car service that the hotel recommended and we were given door-to-door service for our group of 5 for the same fees we would have paid for the ART shuttle.  (Sofia, our driver, was awesome AND she had her own booster seat for our kiddo!)  We were in town to celebrate my daughter's sixth birthday and the hotel staff could not have made it a more special event.  Balloons and a coloring book were delivered to our room the night we checked in and my daughter was greeted with cookies and stickers from the front desk staff.    My only constructive criticism is that the complimentary cookies have
Manager Response: Thank you for this perfect review and Happy Birthday to your daughter! Providing a perfect hotel experience is what we strive for! Thank you very much for the special name mentions to Sofia and Vaelntin, your compliments will be shared with the team!We are excited to welcome you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel staff, really old hotel
Summary: Don’t expect a large bathtub, this was the worst part of my stay. I booked the King Suite and called the day before arriving and ask if it was a Jacuzzi tub. The lady I spoke with ensured me that it was. I arrived around 6:30 and there was a mix up with the rooms and I had to wait. I didn’t get my room key until at least an hour later. The staff was super sweet and helpful and comped my parking ($18 a night) and my breakfast for two. However, the suite was weirdly designed and kind of retro looking (furniture, room plan, etc.).
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We apologize for any inconvenience during your stay. We are happy to hear the front desk took care of you and waived your parking and gave you free breakfast for two! We hope you will give us the opportunity and stay with us again.  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Stayed in this hotel while visiting Disneyland and Santa Monica. The hotel is absolutely beautiful. The room was large and spacious. Extremely clean and kept clean throughout our stay. We were greeted with warm cookies and complimentary water bottles as we are Hilton Honors members. The staff was very polite at the front desk and gave us some tips for Disneyland as this was our first time in California. About an hour drive from LAX and only a little longer to Santa Monica pier. Hotel is about 10 minute walk from Disneyland and is surrounded by other hotels and a ton of restaurants. You do have to pay for parking daily here but that seems to be the norm for the area. Every Hilton-brand hotel we've stayed in has met an incredible standard of service- this one measured up
Manager Response: Thank you for this excellent review! Providing exceptional service is what we take great pride in, we are thrilled to hear your comments about our front desk. We hope to welcome you back next time you are in this part of California!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for a few days
Summary: I stayed here for business for several days. Overall my stay was fine. Even though I am a Hilton Diamond member I was not given my breakfast vouchers. I was a bit surprised to hear a dog barking since I was on the 15th floor - it wasn't loud. The next day I did see someone in the lobby with a med sized dog.  My room was clean & tidy, with efficient daily service. The WiFi connection was strong, and ran at a decent speed.  The breakfast buffet was a bit disappointing for $18. The scrambled eggs were reconstituted, not fresh. If you're here for a few days there's not a lot of variety. You can order from a menu if desired.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: If y'all are in Anaheim for Disney Land, Doubletree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort Convention Center is a place to stay. The room is clean and spacious. The front staffs are really attentive and friendly. There is a rooftop pool. They have stores, café and restaurants. Parking is about 20 bucks per day. Best part was the freshly baked chocolate chip cookie that they baked everyday. It is free!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to review our hotel. We value our guests' feedback as we strive to deliver excellence in service, accommodations, and convenience. Your comments are certainly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon to the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center.   Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: We had an amazing experience at this hotel The staff treats you like family. They have restaurants,stores,café, and room service. Its  a beautiful hotel and very comfortable Beds you just sink into them. I cant forget there amazing chocolate chip cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending and taking the time to write about our hotel! We believe our guests are our family, and should be treated as such! We hope to welcome you back soon, we will have our delicious chocolate chip cookies waiting.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Warm, friendly, more than efficient is how I would describe the staff.
Summary: From our first contact with Roger at the front desk to Arianna answering multiple questions with grace and style what a great staff.  The teamwork and level of professionalism without making your customer uncomfortable for asking the same questions they have probably heard hundreds of times.  Beautiful resort and very clean and comfortable .   And although we were not here for Disney but for work I felt like this was an island of calm in a crazy touristy area.  Thank you Ariana, Roger, April, Maria, David and all the rest working behind the scenes.
