Manager Response: Thank YOU for this wonderful review! We are so happy to read all the compliments amongst our staff! Please come back soon to our island of calm! =)  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anahiem Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: 5 great nights, perfect for Disneyland, if you don't mind paying for a quick $10 taxi each way
Summary: We were thrilled with this hotel. Travelling with a 10 and 8 year old we chose this hotel because of its price, location and two beds plus lounge area. We were not disappointed at all.  The room was excellent, a lounge to relax in and two comfy beds. We requested a high floor and Disneyland views and got it, well worth asking for.  We ate at the hotel for all 5 breakfasts which was not our intention but the buffet was great and kids ate free if parents are buffet as well.  It was terrific.   Rooms service pizza and salads were also excellent, we hadn't planned this either but twice chose to and didn't regret.   Staff were really obliging and the kids loved the free cookies each day.  Be ready to pay $10 each way to get to the gates of Disneyland as it is a 15 minute walk with
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write this five star review! We are so excited to read how much you enjoyed our property here at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. We hope to welcome back your family soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Now let me start of by saying that the rooms were nice, hotel was clean, no maint. Issues... however where this place really shines and blows all of my expectations out of the water is their front desk staff!! Mainly a young lady named ariyana (hope i spelled her name correctly) first off she was our hilton ambassador helped with any questions my cousin or i had, extremly friendly, very professional and just overall made us feel like we were part of the doubletree family. I was blown away by her attitude, and politeness even being a little later in the evening. You can tell she absolutely loves what she does, and it clearly shows by the way she interacts and treats all of her hotel guests. Like i said hotel looked nice no issues but the 1 and only reason why i would stay at this
Manager Response: Wow! It is such a great compliment to us to hear how Arianna shinned and blew all of your expectations out of the water! We are thrilled to hear Arianna made you feel welcomed and we too think she is a valuable and exceptional employee! We hope to welcome you back very soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary: Wow, what an incredible experience here at the Hilton Doubletree. Staff was incredibly helpful and caring. Overnight desk manager (employee of the month December 2016) her name was Arianna G, she took notice to me being stressed out and she took a moment to ask me how I was doing tonight, and with that simple question we ended up maintaining an open dialogue and I explained to her how I was stressing over hurricane irma and it hitting florida especially cause that is home and my family (all my family) is there weathering the strom. She was extremely kind and went out of her way completely to help ease my mind. I would highly recommend this hotel to anybody.  Staff: A++ Cleanliness: A+ Room: A+ Food: A  Overall Grade: A+
Manager Response: Wow! We are more then flattered that you consider our hotel to be A++! Providing a high standard of customer service is what we strive for, and Arianna is exceptional at providing such service. We will share your comments with our team. Thank you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Staff was accomodating, trustworthy, and friendly. Room was clean when we arrive. The front desk, Maria, who was there both days that I stayed was very nice. Adriana the manager was very understanding as well.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to our hotel. We are flattered that you thought our staff was accommodating, trustworthy, and friendly. An inviting atmosphere is what we strive for, and we are glad that our team made you feel welcomed here. We will let Maria know you thought she was very nice. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Rooms very tired and multiple maintenance issues during stay - all reported and none fixed. Staff don't appear to care and we're dismissive of concerns. Would seem their understanding of compensation only stretches as far as not charging you for a movie you were not able to watch - like most things in life I'd say it's pretty normal not to pay for things you don't get. Young manager on duty unable to deal with situation - showed lack of experience with customer service issues. Very poor all round - stay elsewhere in the area if you wish to avoid frustration.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel.  Very helpful staff.  Great rooms and delicious onsite restaurant and room service too.  Would definitely stay here again and only a short cab ride to Disneyland.  Cab cost:  $ 8.00 and I not sure of the bus cost, probably cheaper.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this wonderful review! The ART shuttle is a small fee of $5.50 all day for adults. We look forward to your next stay with us!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Beautiful clean, well appointed 2 bedroom suite within one mile of Downtown Disney.  Great breakfast and the very best front desk staff experience I have ever had.  They went above and beyond in every way.
Manager Response: It is such a great compliment to us that you were impressed with our front desk staff! We will share your comments with our team, and are so excited to hear they went above and beyond. Thank you, and we hope to welcome you back soon to our hotel.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We recently stayed here for four nights during Disneyland's Half Marathon weekend.  The hotel is about a mile from Disneyland.  There is an ART bus stop right outside of the hotel.  The ART buses for routes 1 and 2 stop at the hotel. ART takes you to Disneyland.  We actually walked to the parks a couples of times.  There are various restaurants and stores within walking distance of the hotel.  Our flight was early, so we arrived at the hotel before noon and were surprised that our room was ready.  Check-in was quick.  I am an HHonors member and my room was on the 4th floor which was one of the two HHonors floors.  As we were entering our room, I saw the housekeeper and I told her that we would need extra wash clothes and towels.  I was surprised that she gave us extra ones
Manager Response: Thank you for this detailed review! We appreciate your kind words.  We hope to have you back soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: My stay at the Double Tree
Summary: Ive stayed at different hotels in this location. But by far staying at the Double Tree has been the best by far. Since im a new Disney Annual Passholder i will be coming back every time im in Disney. 😁
Manager Response: Thank you for becoming a loyal guest! We are excited to have you back soon!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Went with family to Disneyland and spent considerable time reviewing the hotel options. For the price, there is nothing comparable. Suite and pool clean. Staff helpful. Would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us this five star review! Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are happy to hear you and your family would definitely stay again, we look forward to the next stay!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Had the pleasure of staying here last week on an extended stay with work. Our usual hotel was full so ended up here. The room was huge. 2 double beds, separate lounge with fridge and microwave, spacious bathroom. On checking in was met by a friendly guy called Roger who couldn't do enough for our party. (We are airline staff and Roger was extremely customer focussed and very friendly). Nothing was too much trouble. The bar staff (Monica) were lonely serving great food from a varied menu. Would prefer this hotel to our usual crew hotel. Pool area clean and quiet. The only negative point is the poor wi if which kept on dipping out.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for the kind words regarding Roger and Monica! Please be assured that your compliments of our  team will be shared and are always enjoyed by each associate.  Please come back and visit us, we will be waiting!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We stayed here with our sons on a recent visit.  The hotel was clean, but the room we had was definitely in need of some updating.  The furniture and fixtures just seemed old. The close proximity to the parks was a bonus, however, one had to navigate through mini homeless camps around the bus stops to get there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We chose this hotel because of the close proximity to Disneyland. We had a suite and paid a pretty penny to stay here....the first thing that rubbed me the wrong way...they charge for parking $40 a day! When we checked in I notice two spiders in our room, then the next day I saw a few more spiders. We went down to eat in the restaurant and the breakfast buffet was FULL of fruit flies. I went and complained to the front desk and they said they don't own the restaurant so there was nothing they could do about that but as far a the spiders maybe I had a nest in my room (YUCK) and they would need photographic evidence to believe me. So I went back to my room and of course I found a spider on the ceiling outside my room and another inside. I snapped pictures and all they did to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Read many of the reviews and found a lot of things accurate.  Overall I was satisfied and would recommend.  Some highlights below -   - Rooms nice, but in need of upgrade - Staff very nice and helpful - Close to Disneyland, ART bus stop right outside of hotel and walk is about 20 minutes - Many restaurants within walking distance - Buffet breakfast is above average and offers a lot more than your average hotel
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recommending our hotel! Our location is amazing considering how close we are to Disneyland and all of our walkable restaurants nearby. And the ART shuttle is super convenient if you don't feel like walking. We look forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary: My family and I love staying at this hotel.  We all love their cookies you get when you check in. Staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are always clean. The food at the buffet is great. It's close to Disneyland. The wifi is the only thing we get frustrated with. It loses connection too frequently. Other than that we love this hotel. It's one of my top five hotels I choose from when we go to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for this review and most importantly Happy Birthday! We are delighted you stayed with us on your special day. And thank you for your feed back about the Wi-Fi, we will look into this.  We look forward to your next stay with us in Anaheim!  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I had a lot of difficulties during my stay because of my disability I was not able to shower and use the toilet as needed I call tree times the front desk and i did not get the help I requested and had no time to spend calling again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a loyal Hilton customer, you are among our most valued guests. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Our Executive team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience. Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel before and loved it!! THIS HAS CHANGED!!! I have never met a Ruder staff from the moment I checked in  - all they cared about was getting my money!! There was no hello or anything other than we will be charging you this or that etc. The rooms are still good and the hotel itself is satisfactory but the staff are sub par

Summary Heading: Great location, hotel not what I thought it would be
Summary: Our flight got in around 9am and we called them after 11am to see if we can get an early check in. The lady advised us to call back after 12/1pm so we decided to grab a bite and just go straight there but was told to come back at 2 because we wanted 2 rooms next/close to each other. So we did just that, still no room available and while waiting a gentleman brought out 1 cookie for each of us and apologized for the wait however from what I read we were to get warm cookies on arrival anyway. After 4 we finally got our room and someone handed my husband some balloons with a cookie for our anniversary and my daughters birthday. Room was pretty clean, however some things needed attention...for example the coffee maker was dirty and 3 blankets had holes in them, the shower sounded

Just a short (15 min) walk from Disneyland is this well equipped hotel. Huge suites with comfortable beds/ sofa-beds and modern conveniences throughout. Lovely bathrooms too.  Our visit was punctuated by outstanding service from the welcoming staff;  -tips for our visit to Anaheim both in and out of Disneyland,  -nice bar with wide drinks selection and tasty snacks! -organised our transfer to next destination, -support with our youngest member when she had simply had enough of travelling,  -lots and lots of 'Welcome cookies' (and English Breakfast tea!). -nice breakfast on our departure morning   Pool area and jacuzzi on second floor were a delight to look forward to each day **Tip the jacuzzi control is on the gate post behind the disabled access chair**  "ART Bus" stop for
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such a detailed review and highly recommending the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center.  We can't wait till your next stay with your family!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Great location, friendly staff and very helpful Disney  associate. The pool was great too. You can watch the fireworks from Disney right at the pool. The shuttle for Disney is right in front of the hotel too. Great place will definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a kind review! We appreciate your loyalty! We will be looking forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Works for a visit to Disneyland
Summary: This was our third visit to Disneyland in the last year and was organized relatively late.  The Doubletree was the only Hilton property near the park that had a reasonable rate.  It is a few blocks further away than the Hilton Hotel and Homewood Suites that we had stayed at previously.  It was still an easy walk in the morning.  Less easy after 14 hours of walking around Disneyland.    We had a 2Q suite which was spacious, clean and comfortable.  We had breakfast in their restaurant.  It was OK.  Not spectacular, but tasty and filling.  If the price differential between here and the Hilton were the same, I'd stay at the Doubletree again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center. We appreciate your compliments of our location, and clean comfortable rooms. We hope to see you soon!  Management  Double-Tree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We look forward to returning.  This is a classy, comfortable experience.  We all especially loved the warm, welcoming chocolate chip cookies!  Better than I make them.  This will be our family gathering place in the future.
Manager Response: What a Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious review! Thank you so much for this lovely review Patricia.  We will make sure to save some warm chocolate chip cookies for your return staty in the near future!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: The hotel was terrific- clean, quiet and about a 5 minute drive to Disneyland. The staff was extremely  helpful. It was a large, two room suite that could easily sleep four. There's a great pool and the restaurant was also quite good.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your stay with us.  We pride ourselves on helpful, friendly staff! We hope to see you next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: I visited with my son for an event at the convention center, located within a 10 minute walk (around 7 minutes, to be more precise).  In addition to this property, there are TONS of other hotels/motels in the immediate area.  This must be the "hotel/motel capital of the world."  I've NEVER seen such a concentration of hotels and motels in one area, ever---  I'm not exaggerating.    In addition to the convention center, Disneyland is nearby.  Some people say you can walk to it, but it's a relatively long walk from this hotel.    My son and I arrived at the hotel early, around 11:45am.  At the check-in counter, we were told our room was ready but there is a $25 "early check-in fee."  I never heard of such a money-grab.  As a Hilton Rewards member, I objected to the fee and the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this detailed review.  We are happy to hear that with all the other hotels nearby you would choose us again, your loyalty means everything to us! We look forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: If you can look through the hustle and bustle of the Disneyland visitors who stay at this hotel, the hotel is very nice the rooms are clean and the staff is outstanding.    Say they hotel is very full and I was worried it would be noisy but my room is very quiet and did not hear any of the noise in the halls or downstairs.  The cost of the hotel was very reasonable and I will be staying at this hotel in the future..
Manager Response: Thank you for this review! We pride ourselves for having clean rooms and outstanding staff! We are already looking forward to your next stay with us, and appreciate that you will be back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: We visited Disneyland and disney Adventure park and literally walked less than 10 min to the parks which is on the same street, with plenty of lighting and restaurants along the way.  Hotel was clean.  Beautiful decor and we loved the staff.  A +++++++
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you so much for the A++++++! We love to hear you enjoyed your very quick walk to Disneyland, our clean hotel and loved the staff! We aim for excellence in our hotel experience. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Location was fantastic for Disneyland access, and using the bus to get there and back. The breakfast was great and the staff fantastic. Will stay again. Room was very tidy and comfortable and quiet for sleeping
Manager Response: Thank you for this fantastic review! We are very excited to hear you will be coming back again! Thank you for becoming a loyal guest with the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Our room was at the end of the hall on the 5th floor.  Very quiet.  Also, we loved the fact that in the Suites, the bedroom could be closed off by two doors for anyone that needed more sleep and others that might be up.  The bathroom as a good arrangement.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We are pleased to hear your stay was peaceful and enjoyable. We look forward to your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: I will stay at the Doubletree again without hesitation. Warm chocolate chip cookies, shuttle to Disney right in front of property. Staff very courteous. My room was cleaned and had not issues. Parking near hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! We are thrilled to hear you will be coming back. We are excited for your next visit!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Except for rigid check-in policy, hospitality is good.
Summary: A very nice standard mid-range hotel with a well-trained staff to insure hospitality. The rooms a clean and equipped with everything you would expect in this category. They have a nice little pool and a good restaurant. We were on business, but travelling with a friend who has special needs (terminal brain cancer). We could not check in at 2 p.m. when we arrived, and there was no place for him to rest away from the noise and confusion of the lobby. The first hour waiting for our rooms was difficult, but once that hurdle was passed the stay was good. Comfortable beds, free wi-fi and other amenities. The best thing was when our friend complained about hallway noise at 11 p.m. the staff comped us breakfast. Very decent!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are thrilled to hear our staff was able to help and accommodate to your needs.  We hope to welcome you back again!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: You would think all rooms would be suites due to the name of the hotel. Wrong. After getting room issue resolved had a pleasant stay, cookies are good, hotel and rooms clean and well kept. Very nice. Also close to Disneyland with shuttle service and tickets available in the lobby. Dennys across the street was a plus for breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear your issue was resolved and you had a pleasant stay! We hope to welcome you back again soon.   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel for families doing Disney
Summary: Doubletree suites was a great place for our family. We had a friend join us and the separate bedroom really helped with privacy.  About a 15 min walk from the hotel to the Disney gates. Plus an easy to catch shuttle for $5 per person at the hotel doorstep. Disney tickets for sale in the lobby which was very convenient.   The cafe was a bit of a disappointment as it always seems to be closed when we needed to grab something.  And the restaurant downstairs was just okay. Only went once and decided to eat a downtown Disney instead.  The pool was full of sun all the time which we love.  Would definitely stay there again in the future.  Tip* ask the front desk for their fresh warm cookies. You can get as many as you want as often as you want!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their time with us.  We look forward of your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Great amazing stay! Overall it was one of the best hotel stays We have had.  Everyone was always accomodating and always willing to help. The whole family loved staying there and it was very close to everything downtown!
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing review! What a compliment to hear we are one of the best hotels you have ever stayed with! We very much look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Staff always very friendly and helpful
Summary: Stayed at this hotel many times. The staff is always friendly and helpful.  It is a great location if you are going to Disney or a ballgame, etc.  The only "problem" item is that the rooms, while clean and fairly comfortable, are starting to get a bit run down as far as seeing some cracked grout and caulking, stained tubs and sinks, etc.  They could use a refresh.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  We are happy to welcome you back and happy to hear the staff is always friendly and helpful! We look forward to your next stay.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: This was a great location, friendly staff and clean rooms! The warm cookies adds a nice touch. The only drawback is no private shuttle but easy to walk to park or use App Based Rider service. We would definitely stay here again in the future!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed our location and staff! We do have a shuttle service here that runs every 30 minutes to and from Disneyland for a nominal fee. We definitely are excited for your stay with us in the future!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: The staff handled everything very well and I appreciate how they handled a situation I brought to them quickly and efficiently. The stay was top notch. I had an issue unrelated to the hotel and they helped me feel like they were able to help and they did and that impressed me greatly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this very flattering review.We are always pleased to learn that we have met our guests' expectations and appreciate your kind words and compliments of our property and staff. We certainly look forward to your return in, hopefully, the near future.  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Doubletree in Anaheim.  It is in a good location.  Warm cookie on arrival was great.  Breakfast was great, but not complimentary.  Nice spacious rooms.  Nice to have a pull out couch bed in living room area for our teenager.
Manager Response: Your feedback of your recent stay at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center is very much appreciated.  Thank you for taking the time and letting us know you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anahiem Resort - Convention Ceneter

Summary: Overall, a good value. Suite was large and clean. Staff friendly and welcoming. On the downside, hallways smelled a bit musty. No USB ports anywhere in rooms. Couch in suite was ancient and creaked mightily.

Summary Heading: Good location, but there are better hotels in the area.
Summary: I can't in good faith recommend this hotel.  It's too expensive (and I stayed on a convention rate) for the condition of the hotel and didn't include things that other hotels in the area do (like breakfast!).  The hotel is worn, the service was average, and it looks dated.  The a/c in our room really struggled, but on the upside the bed was really nice.  I don't think we'd stay here again when we can stay a half block closer in another Hilton branded hotel and get better services.

What a great hotel, we are a family of five and had plenty of room.  I do wish the two queen beds weren't in the same bedroom but we made it work.  The whole staff was welcoming upon arrival and departure, we were always offered warm cookies (which were delicious).  The pool area was nice, they ran out of towels a couple of times but were there within minutes to restock.  ART (shuttle) was right next to the parking lot, many restaurants within 1 mile to eat at.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: What a great review! We are happy to hear your family enjoyed your time here with us and you enjoyed all of our amenities. We are looking forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: The service at this hotel is mixed, initial first impressions were great but from there it went down hill.  The room was clean and well kept but the housekeeping service was not consistent.  The location is with in walking distance to the convention center and Disneyland was nice.  The breakfast served each morning was adequate, the service was hit or miss and we were often seated at tables that were not set up for new guests while other fully set up tables were ready.  Additionally the food bar was not very clean which resulted in bugs flying around on several occasions..  While they offered a bell service they would not let guest use the luggage carts for safety reasons but the Bell staff was not very careful with handling others luggage which resulted in it being dropped.  I
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us, and your valuable feedback. We are very sorry to hear about some of your experiences being less than perfect.  Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience.  We hope you will give us another try in the future.   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention- Center

Summary: We normally stay at a different hotel up the road, although tried DoubleTree and actually had a better time. The cost was great, people were very friendly. The rooms have a ton of space for the kids to play and enjoy their time, and the beds are very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you writing this review, and staying with the DoubleTree. We are extremely happy to hear you gave us another try and had a great time with your family. We hope to welcome you back very soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: Great area and very convienant and easily accessible to everything around the area and walking distance to the parks and restaurants. We would def stay here again on our next trip and time we are back in California.
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to write this five star review! We are thrilled to hear you will definitely stay with us again when you are back in California, we look forward to it!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Very good hotel with walking distance to Disneyland.the staff was friendly. A lot good restaurants by the hotel which was a added plus.  The pool was awesome especially after a hot day. Overall the room was awesome and very spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent visit to DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center. We are so pleased you enjoyed our staff, restaurant, and pool. We hope to welcome you back very soon.   Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Convenient for the Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: We stayed here while attending a 3 day convention.  We walked to the convention each day, it was a safe and easy walk.  The ART bus stops right outside the hotel if you want to go to Disneyland or other area attractions.   The room is split into a living room and bedroom.   There is a microwave and mini fridge in the living room which was nice.  The safe in the closet was large and would easily hold two laptops.  It would be nice if they would add a makeup mirror in the bathroom.   I would not recommend room service or the restaurant downstairs, we ate there once.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share a review about your recent visit. We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your 3 day convention stay with us. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary Heading: Very nice and large rooms, friendly
Summary: Even though the walk to Disneyland took about 15 to 20 minutes (brisk walk) this hotel was very close to the Anaheim convention center (5-7 minute walk). Rooms are suites. Very nice. Clean. Safe. There is a bus service that the front desk can help with to get to and from Disney without the walk.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this review. We are happy to hear you were able to walk to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center so quickly, the hotel provides easy access to all the city has to offer! We hope to welcome you back very soon.  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort Convention-Center

Summary: The hotel is beginning to show signs of wear and tear. We stayed in a two room suite that had to clean beds. Both of the queen beds at Patterson's that were well beyond their lifetime years. They were incredibly uncomfortable. The sofa bed mattress was also began its lifecycle. The staff was very friendly, and agreed that it was time for a mattress changeover for the hotel.  location is great, especially if you were attending event at the Anaheim convention center. A little TLC and this will be a great property.

Summary Heading: Great location and easy shuttle access to Disneyland; comfortable and spacious rooms!
Summary: Great location and easy & reasonable shuttle access to Disneyland; comfortable and spacious rooms! Exceeded our expectations. Will definitely stay again! The warm chocolate cookies were definitely yummy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, we are so pleased we exceeded your expectations! We are also extremely happy to hear you enjoyed our shuttle access to Disneyland and our comfortable and spacious rooms. We very much look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Rooms are comfortable and spaceous. Breakfast is great. Housekeeping was not up to par. No private shuttle - public bus is very slow getting to/from parks. Walking is quicker, or a taxi if there are 4 or more is just as cheap as the bus (if you don't want to return more than once)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious and comfortable rooms along with breakfast. We do offer a shuttle service, running every 30 minutes to and from Disneyland. However, being ideally located one mile from Disneyland does make it for an enjoyable walk. We look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Well located, nice sized rooms but will NEVER stay again
Summary: I chose this hotel over the Hyatt Regency I usually stay at because I am a gold member and because my company has a good rate at Doubletree.  I will never stay here again. Sure the room is good sized. The hotel is well located. The staff at the front desk and bell desk is great.  Why won't I stay again: the "free" breakfast got me violently ill. I kick myself for ignoring all the warning signs: flies in the food, a worker constantly stirring the food to make it appear fresh, even scooping off the counter and back into the buffet server, the sticky disgusting floor. I ignored, at the food and got food poisoning. If you aren't going to eat at the hotel and get a good rate and don't care about cleanliness then maybe you consider? Otherwise - there are lots of better options.

proximity to Disneyland Parks, retail locations, food makes it a good hotel in Anaheim The Cookies are always fabulous, though high calorie item I always enjoy them, we got a few whenever we were going out. The breakfast was good and the family enjoyed the stay throughout.  well furnished rooms with a Microwave made life easy with Kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: From the valet to the front desk clerks and room service team,  these gals and guys make you feel welcome.  The customer service is superb and great location.  Also the rooms are cozy and the bed comfortable. The rooms and bathrooms are clean and the halls are quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We strive to have our guests feel welcome with our superb customer service! We look forward to your return visit.  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This is probably the worst hotel we have ever stayed in, I can't understand how it has so many good reviews.   We had come to Anaheim after spending 5 nights in Vegas at the Wynn hotel - so we knew that where we ended up was going to be a downgrade.   Pros:  1) Staff were very nice and welcoming   2) Free cookies were good   3) Close to Disney   4) lobby was modern and nice looking   Cons:  1) Rooms were outdated, dark and miserable no water on arrival. (travelogues have nicer rooms)  2) Room very noises, air conditioning unit was annoyingly loud and you traffic noice was very load  3) "Swim laps in our pool" - pool was tiny the bath in the last hotel was bigger   4) not enough sun beds, for a big hotel there was only 15 sun beds out every time to tried to go to the pool there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your pros and cons about your recent visit. We are thrilled to hear our staff was friendly, you enjoyed our cookies, and our close proximity to Disneyland. We are disheartened to hear that your experience was less than perfect as we strive to create memorable visits for all our guests. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Management DoubleTree Suites Anaheim-Resort Convention Center

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, close to many food options, the convention center, and the Disney parks. Very clean, well-maintained hotel. My family of four enjoyed our time there. The pool's small size was perfect for my small children, but I think it is big enough for older kids to enjoy as well.
Manager Response: We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with your family. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and look very forward to your return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Motel was very clean, bed comfort was average.  Staff was very friendly and housekeeping gave us extra coffee for the coffee machine each day after we left a note with the cleaning tip.   Motel was quiet and in close to convenience stores and restaurants.  Pool was clean and lounge chairs were comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for letting us know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Please be assured that our associates always appreciate knowing that our guests appreciate their service and attention.  We hope to have you back again soon!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Very uncomfortable bed, flat pillows, didn't restock coffee, wasn't told about any amenities, one of the lamps wasn't working. When I complained following the first stay the guy at the front desk didn't do anything about it maybe he couldn't but he didn't even try it get someone who could help me. I always stay within the Hilton family bug this was the worse as a matter of fact this is my first complaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. On behalf of our staff, we would like to extend our sincere apologies for your recent experience. We strive the provide the finest personal services and facilities for all our guests. We hope you will restore your faith with us and give us another opportunity to stay within the Hilton family.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Ceneter

Summary Heading: Quality Hotel in the Hilton Chain
Summary: We have stayed in this hotel about 5 times over the past 3-4 years and have always been happy with this hotel.  The staff are friendly, the rooms are well maintained (though they are getting close to needing some updates).  Downside would be that they charge for parking despite the fact that they do not need to, but I guess that is California for you.  The restaurant is good.  The wi-fi qualify is fair and is in part based on your hilton honors status level.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty, it means the world to us! We look forward to your next stay with us.   Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort-Convention Center

Summary: Beautiful hotel, very professional staff. Easy walk to Disneyland. But really if you don't want to walk, it is an $3-$4 Uber ride. By far the best breakfast buffet I have experienced. Usually not a fan of Buffet but these people do it right. Fresh, real food. By real I mean not the processed bacon and powdered eggs. Huge variety of items. I stayed June 2017 @ $125 a night. Great value.
Manager Response: What a excellent review.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are very happy to hear you thought our breakfast buffet was the best you have experienced. We look forward to your return visit.    Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: 5 star hotel for a great price. Walking distance to Convention Center and Disneyland. Walking distance to restaurants and or fast food. Hotel exceeded expectations all around. Friendly staff, clean room and comfortable bed. Accommodations included a fridge, microwave, and free WiFi. Planing on staying at this hotel when in the area. Always a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are a great destination for families traveling to the Anaheim area.  With our incredible location, walking to the Convention Center and Disneyland is a breeze! We are delighted we exceeded your expectations and can't wait to welcome you again.  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Just wanted to share how great we thought this Doubletree Suites in Anaheim was. Three employees we interacted with were Arriana, Maria and Esperanza. All three women were so nice and helpful. The parking lot of this hotel is spacious, and all of the parking is pretty close to the front entrance of the hotel. The lobby is nice and clean and pretty. There is a little gift shop in this area, as well as a bar, a restaurant, and a coffee bar with snacks. A few tables with chairs, are located right by this coffee bar.  Warm chocolate chip cookies are behind the front desk, and even if you have you already checked in, you can swing by the desk to ask for more. Our room consisted of a living room area......a couch, coffee table, chair, tv, mini fridge, microwave, desk with a couple
Manager Response: Thank you for this AWESOME five star review! We appreciate you taking the time to write how much you loved our hotel! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us.  We look forward to your return visit!  Management  DoubleTree Suites By Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: We spent 5 nights at these suites on our Westjet Disney vacation.  We loved it.  It was beautiful and clean.  Our suite was spacious with ample sleeping areas for 4. It had a separate bedroom, a table with chairs to sit at to eat and a living room area to relax in.  It was walkable to Disneyland but we mostly took the inexpensive and convenient ART transit to and fro to save time and steps.  We were always greeted with friendly smiles and bountiful warm cookis that are signature to the Doubletree Hilton.  Would definitely stay again and recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write us such a complimentary review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our ART shuttle services. We are also thrilled to hear you were consitantly greeted with friendly smiles and warm cookies! That's what our hotel hospitality is all about! We will have some warm cookies waiting for your next return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: I am a HH member and my family and I stayed at the DT from June 15th - June 19th to Celebrate my dad's 80th Birthday and Father's Day.I had asked if balloons and cookies could be placed in the room and they went a step furhter and also attached a signed a card from the staff. Super Sweet.  A couple days prior to arrival "Luke" answered and was so helpful and HAPPY. It is so refreshing when you can feel someones smile over the phone.  That is someone who enjoys his job so THANK YOU Luke!  Mario in the Restaraunt is also a Doll! We remeber him from last year as well and it's like he and my dad have known eachother for years! LOL Love that! The gift shop folks also a delight and funny. I especially enjoyed chatting it up with them again. And OMG... Last but definetely not
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this AMAZING review, we are delighted you and your family had such a special stay!  I will be more then happy to share this with our staff especially LUKE and ARIANA! We pride ourselves in providing a first class experience for all our guests and taking that extra step to really personalize each guests stay.  We are looking forward to your next stay with us!  Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great option for visit to Disneyland
Summary: This is an excellent choice for families staying at Anaheim and visiting Disneyland. The rooms are clean and large and have everything you need to make your stay comfortable. The front desk staff are very friendly and extremely helpful. I would certainly stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center! We are fortunate to have such close proximity to Disneyland.  And thank you for also highlighting our front desk, they are extremely helpful and friendly! We are excited for your next stay with us!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Great location. Near food and fun.   Shuttle service by Anaheim resort transportation (ART) is worth the fair price they charge after a long day of walking in the parks/shopping.   Breakfast buffet was a bit pricey but kids ate free with a paying adult. Gold Honor Members got free breakfast for each day reserved. We didn't eat dinner there  Staff is awesome.   Great gift shop on site below prices from the parks.   Starbucks coffee on site  Disney tickets on site.   Rooms were oversized. Living room that had doors leading into the one bedroom with two queen beds.   Pool and hot tub
Manager Response: WOW, what a great review! We thank you for being a valued Gold Honors Member.  We also thank you for highlighting in detail all of our amenities on property! Sounds like you were able to put all to good use! We look forward to your return visit here with us.   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family
Summary: From the moment we checked in, everything was great about this hotel. Loved the lobby and friendly staff. Parking was close and ample. Room was clean and spacious. Beds were super comfy. I was traveling with my big family and we couldn't have asked for anything better. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are overjoyed that you and your family couldn't have asked for anything better.  Your loyalty means the world to us, thank you for this flattering five star review. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Pros: - When we checked in, we were slated for an accessible room. The front desk clerk asked if that was by request (it wasn't) and was able to quickly accommodate our request for a standard room.  Thank you! - Awesome shower!  Nice, strong spray and plenty of hot water. - Clean, safe, comfortable room - Nice outdoor pool  Cons: - No second space in the room with a mirror and outlets paired with poor, overhead lighting made it difficult for us all to get ready in the morning since everyone had to jockey for a space at the mirror/with an outlet in the bathroom. - Expected two queen beds, but the room had two double beds.  No big deal, but my hubby is 6'4" and it was much more snug than a queen would have been! - Terrible blow dryer
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am happy to hear all your compliments of our hotel. The front desks eagerness to accommodate your room, the awesome showers, and our comfortable clean rooms are just a few of the many Pros we have to offer here at the DoubleTree Suites. We hope to welcome you back again!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Paid way more than another hotel with same room accommodations but you don't get even a complimentary breakfast. You have to pay for a shuttle to Disneyland, which it was cheaper for my family to just park there since we are a family of 6. Do your homework and look elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are sorry to hear about some of your inconveniences.  We hope you and your family of 6 will give us another opportunity to really wow you!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, misleading website on shuttle
Summary: The hotel was perfect for a family of 5, with 3 young kids. Far away enough to be quiet, nice rooms, friendly people. However, I specifically chose it over many others because the website says it has a "private hotel shuttle", as we have kids who still nap, and we knew we'd be going back and forth to Disney at least once during the day, and they're not great walkers. We didn't want to stay too close due to noise, as the kids sleep early.  The private shuttle seemed the way to go.  It turns out the hotel simply use ART. ART was a nightmare for us. Was never on time, the text2go thing was inaccurate, and one morning we waited 40 min for an ART bus, only to have it skip us because it was too full. So we walked, and fortunately the hotel is a 15 min walk for an adult. But we have 3
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We are fortunate to have such a fantastic location, yet quiet, nice rooms, and friendly staff! We hope to welcome you and your family back!   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: I have stayed at many hotels in the Anaheim area. This is definitely one of the best experiences we have had. The staff was great. The rooms and hotel were clean. I love those cookies they give out which is a nice treat after a long day at Disneyland. The Art to Disneyland is close to hotel. Just very pleased with the experience.
Manager Response: What wonderful comments, thank you. We are thrilled to hear this is the best experience you have had in Anaheim, what a compliment! We will be sure save some of our cookies for your return visit!   Management  DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: The staff was very welcoming and accommodating to personal needs. Perfect location as the bus stop is right outside the entrance which takes you to Disneyland. Will definitely stay at this location again!
Manager Response: We appreciate very much, you taking the time to let us know that our staff is welcoming and accommodating! We love to make your stay more personable and memorable. We are excited for your next stay with us!   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Good location to park and shuttle service, decent food in restraunt and food offer for the kids. Disney tickets available but no discounts for guests to the park. Pool was nice and lobby and rooms clean and beds comfy
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your compliments and kind words of our property. We always appreciate knowing our guests enjoyed their time with us and share their positive experience. We look forward to a return visit!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Amazing hotel! The two queen suite is amazing! The warm cookies at check-in are the cherry on top! I highly recommend! Beautiful lobby, welcoming bar and delicious restaurant! Very easy drive to theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the double thumbs up review! We are thrilled to hear you think our hotel is amazing and highly recommend us! Please visit us again soon, we will have that warm cookie waiting for you!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: My husband and I came to celebrate our anniversary for the weekend at Disneyland and staid at the Double Tree. It was such an amazing experience and a great deal of it was because of a man who worked at the front desk ROGER. He was truly spectacular. Went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. He checked us in with a smile and made sure we had everything we needed for a perfect weekend. He helped us to use the shuttle service to go to Disneyland so we would not have to drive. The next morning on the shuttle having the morning off was Roger. He remembered checking us in the night before and not even being on the clock he said hello and asked how are trip was so far and said he would be back at work later and if we need anything to make our trip more enjoyable please ask.
Manager Response: WOW, thank you for this incredible review! We are overjoyed to hear about your stay with us on your anniversary! We are especially delighted to hear how spectacular Roger was at making your stay special and one to remember! We hope to make this an anniversary tradition!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Family of 4 stayed here for 2 nights to go to Disney. Suites are nice and large and a good setup with bathroom and sink accessible to both family room and bedroom. Diamond member got free breakfast which was a nice typical Hilton style full buffet breakfast. Ate dinner one night in the restaurant and they had buy one entree get kids meal for free which is nice. we walked to Disney and it was an easy 10-15 minute walk there. on the way back around 8pm we stopped in at a 7-11 along the way and grabbed some sandwiches for dinner. there are several restaurants right outside of Disney as well.  at check in we were told we were upgraded to a fireworks view on the 6th floor. we stared outside our windows from 9-10pm 2 nights and neither night did we see fireworks. I would stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for being a valued Hilton Honor member, and taking the time to write such a great review. We appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton Brand! We also love that you and your kids enjoyed Disneyland our hotel. We hope to welcome you and the little ones back very soon!   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: This hotel was very clean, comfortable and welcoming. The staff was very fun, professional and welcoming. I felt safe as there was always security presence. We heard very little from out neighbors, which was super nice! The ability to do laundry was great. I love being able to choose my room and the cookie was a nice added bonus. Please...STAY HERE!
Manager Response: Wow, what great review! Thank you for your kind words.  We look forward to your return visit!   Management- DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: Booked here after reading reviews and getting good deal staying for 6 nights. The property has good security with auto parking barrier (rate included) and well lit areas. The staff were pleasant on check in and we quickly made it to our room. The room was large with desk area and seating area. There was a large fridge and microwave. Off this room was a large bedroom and bathroom. The facilities were good and housekerping get it clean throughout our stay. The only downside was the quality of the breakfast which we only tried once. It was was luke warm and the manager tried to charge us for poached egss which were included in the breakfast charge!! Would return but would avoid the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us, and your valuable feedback.  We are pleased to hear all of your positive reviews! With regards to your breakfast we are sincerely sorry we did not meet the standards. Your comments will helps us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We are happy to hear you will be back again!   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort- Convention Center

Summary: We booked in to this hotel in June 2017.   We were on a bed and breakfast rate.  We were disappointed with the breakfast.  We had the breakfast twice and both times it was disappointing. If you want toast prepare to wait a long time , quicker to bake new loath.  Because of the below par breakfast we asked at reception for us to get a refund for the third breakfast. The guy at reception was very apologetic and said he would fix it all up. We gave him our two breakfast vouchers back for the next mornings breakfast.  The next day when we were checking out we noticed that they had charged for the breakfast  we didn't have. The receptionist called the manager and she stated to us that the guy we spoke to last night had no authority to make that decision. We then were not impressed so

Great location and hotel.  Modern, clean, great for the kids.  Close to Disneyland, restaurants, Anaheim Stadium, Freeway and shops.  Stayed three nights with the family, two children 5 and 8 years old.  Room was spacious.  Beds were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great 5-star review! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed the proximity of our hotel and all the fun attractions. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back!  Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Decent Stay - Close to the Convention Center
Summary: I visited the Doubletree on business for a week.  I chose this hotel due to its proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center.  The reception area is very well done and spacious.  The staff was very accommodating and since I am a Hilton Honors member, maybe they went out of their way to please, but I overheard conversations with others and they we just as nice.  The concierge was there all the time and was very helpful with questions.  The rooms were decent.  The "suite furniture" could be updated and replaced, but was OK for my stay.  The bedroom was spacious and the bed comfortable.  Bathroom was standard as well, but I did like the large counter space around the sink.  I could see this being a great place for a small family to stay for a trip to Disney, as it is walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the warm hospitality of our team and also the close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland.  We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Management DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This is a family friendly hotel within a short distance of Disneyland. The staff is friendly and the hotel is in great shape. We stayed two nights in a suite and the extra room was worth it. While you have to pay for parking the lot is easy to navigate and you aren't far from the main door.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience.  We appreciate your kind words about our team! I'll make sure to share your comments with the team! We hope to welcome you back again.  Management  Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: While the hotel is nice and in a great location. I was needing the "grab-and-go" Cafe Biscotti to be more substantial!!  We were here for a hockey tournament with games that required us to be at the rink by 6AM. The food offerings at this cafe were slim to none not only at 6AM, but the entire day. All I needed was a banana and a bagel. No such luck. They did have a couple sugary options (2 dry croissants, 2 sweet rolls, a few muffins and 0 fresh fruit).  None of which was helpful to eat before a hockey game.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to improve upon our amenities.  We value your business and hope you will give us another opportunity to meet your expectations.  Management Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Typical Hilton brand hotel with impeccable service and cleanliness. Small thing but bedside lamp doesn't have USB charger. Rooftop pool is really second floor. The reception venues are stylish and set up well and food is good with reasonably priced room service.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose our brand hotel.  We appreciate your business and your review.  We hope to welcome you back again!  Management Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: The customer service at this specific hotel is awful. The rooms are very nice and clean. However, I would recommend bringing your own pillows. (They are not very supportive at all) I would also inquire as to if they are having problems with their gates to the parking lot, as you have to pay for parking each day even though you are staying with the hotel. So it seems kind of redunten to pay for parking in a parking lot with broken gates
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments.  We strive to improve upon the services and experience of every guest based on feedback received.  Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will give us another opportunity.  Management  Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Doubletree hotel has the most comfortable beds and the staff is very helpful and professional.  We stayed here with our children 2 years and 8 years and had plenty of room in the suites.  The room was very clean and close to Disneyland.   Less than a mile to the front gate.  We will definitely stay here again.

I'm a Hilton lover and this location is within a mile walk (same side of the street) of the parks. That alone does it for me. Add the quality and cleanliness of the Hilton brand to top it off. I'd definitely stay here again if I didn't want to spend the extra money to stay on Disney property.

The suite of rooms is a welcome find.  I appreciate the separate sleeping and "living" accommodations.  The bed was comfortable.  The staff is friendly.  I look forward to staying here again on business or with family.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: The location is perfect for Disney or Knott's travelers. The staff is wonderful, accommodating even a request for water after a hot day in the park.The rooms are gorgeous, the restaurant and bar are well stocked. I've never seen another property in the area with such an amazing retention of staff. If the employees are happy you know the guests are, too. The suites are perfect for several couples to enjoy, the amenities are stunning and there was not a single thing wrong on my weekend stay. Thank you, a thousand times over for being one of the best places to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Not far from the convention center
Summary: Short walk to the convention center. Not really that close to Disney so you will want to get a ride. If you are there for a conference don't take the shuttle. Just walk. It is always faster and. It a bad walk. The hotel itself is fairly average for a doubletree.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This was our second stay at this hotel and we were not disappointed. Close to shops, restaurants and of course Disneyland. The staff are friendly, helpful and professional and go out of their way to assist you where needed. The cleaning staff do a fabulous job and are friendly and helpful. The rooms are large, modern and functional. The laundry rooms are so good! Reasonably priced and a rarity in US hotels so we were very thankful for this service. Will no doubt stay here again on our next visit. Wish our 3 night stay was longer!!
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We took our family to Disneyland and we're looking for a suite so we could put the little ones to bed and still be able to stay up and watch some tv. This was perfect for what we were looking for. It was close to restaurants, and Disneyland which made it very convinient. Would highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance of Disney
Summary: We chose this hotel as we were using it as a Base to got to disneyland which is approx 1 mile or 15 minutes on foot or an $8 taxi ride. There are are buses that stop outside the hotel that go to Disney if needed but we didn't use them so not sure how much they cost.  We got free cookies on check in which were lovely and free use of the business suite which was handy because we forgot to print stuff for the second part if our holiday.   The standard room was spacious and comfy with all the usual amenities including and iron and fridge. The hotel has a restaurant, basic souvenir shop and coffee shop but there is a 7/11 and c's within 5 minutes walk and on the way to/from disney which again was handy as we stopped there each night for milk and water.   Overall very comfy and clean
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We stayed here for the Disney Tinkerbell Half Marathon.  The location was great for getting to and from the parks.  There is a bus stop right outside the hotel and it is about a 15 minute walk if you don't want to wait.  Staff was super friendly and the hotel was clean and comfortable.  Don't forget to ask for extra cookies!  :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Close enough to the Disney action but far enough to escape it too
Summary: This hotel is a few blocks from Disney but easily walkable if you don't mind the exercise. (It probably takes 15-20 minutes.) Alternatively, there is a bus stop close by or you could drive to the Disney Toy Story parking lot in about 3 minutes but it's so close it seems a waste of money (although you can catch the shuttle bus from there if you don't want to walk).  The hotel itself was clean and spacious with ample parking and the staff were without exception friendly and helpful. There was a good size pool although we didn't have time to use it. If you stay on a high floor at the front of the building you can see the Disney fireworks I'm told. Unfortunately, both nights we were there the fireworks were cancelled due to unfavourable  weather. So think twice about paying extra
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Clean, considerate, comfortable and cookies, too.
Summary: Doubletree delivers every time on the high standards I expect in a hotel. When I am on business at a convention elsewhere, I do not have time to enjoy the amenities other than free internet but I'm sure it's all as nice as my room was. Appreciate them giving us 3 rooms next to each other. And I love the warm cookie on check in!
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing five star review! Thank you for taking the time to share your great experience and for being a valued Hilton Honors member! We are delighted you enjoyed our hotel. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back!  Management, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Very nice, comfortable, walking (5-10 minute) distance to the Convention Center. The room has a Mini Fridge and Microwave. The pool is heated. Cozy Fitness Center. I enjoyed my stay very much. I would stay again. Parking is $18 per day. :(

I stayed for 3 nights in a nicely sized one bedroom suite with 2 queen beds.  Check in was fast and friendly. Love the cookies.  I liked that the vanity/sink is separate from toilet & shower making it more convenient for multiple people to get ready at same time.   Close enough to walk to Disneyland if you want but there is also an ART stop right outside the hotel.   I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Summary Heading: Nice property, convenient location for Disneyland
Summary: Hilton gold member, receive room upgrade and breakfast coupons on arrival. Cookies were also quite welcome.  Room was 4/5, showed slight signs of aging, but a nice room overall.   Breakfast spread was quite nice, comped as a gold member. But for $15.50 normal price, they had plenty of options to choose from. Orange juice was quite tasty.    Bar/lounge area it was OK. Plenty of spirit and liquor options, beer selection was quite nice too.   Service and housekeeping staff were very pleasant and helpful.

Summary Heading: Great location - SOME staff are friendly.
Summary: During the California Dental Assoc.Conference, my company booked a block of rooms to be charged to our corporate accounts. My director placed the reservation on her AMEX and told us that we could use her CC when we arrived, if she wasn't around. When I explained the situation to the young female at the front desk, she rudely responded with "Well, the hotel NEEDS to be paid?!".   I was in shock because my company had a BLOCK of rooms and that this twenty-something was treating me as if I wasn't able to pay the bill. I calmly explained that I was staying for a corporate event and the cardholder would be arriving after our conference activities had ended. Needless to say, I personally won't be using this hotel and have notified my headquarters to book our rooms with another hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  You are our most valued guest. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  I'm sorry that your interaction with the Front Desk was not great. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future and give us another opportunity.

Summary: Very nice property.  Very clean and centrally located.  Just what you'd expect from a Hilton property.  Highly recommend. Nice restaurant on site and easy to walk to others.  Short walk to the Convention Center and has a Disney office for your convenience if that's why you are in Anaheim.

Nice property but access is difficult via a one way (divided) road after a long u-turn light. Parking is easy enough and near in to the front door but like all big hotels, bring your wallet. If Disney World is your destination, this is close enough. If you're on a business trip, the park goers are always a presence and, at times, an obstacle.

The staff was very welcoming and friendly throughout my stay.  My room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. Internet service was okay.  The outside pool was nice on the second floor.  The elevators had a short wait time considering the amount of guest who were there at the time.  I recommend this hotel for business and family vacations.

We booked a vacation here through our travel agent. I love Doubletree as I have 3 teenagers and the extra room makes it easier to enjoy a 4 night stay in a hotel. The room was clean. Love the vanity outside the bathroom so that more people can get ready quickly. The beds are to die for...soft with pillows that are firm enough. We didn't spend a lot of time in the room, we were here for Disneyland.   We had breakfast in the hotel 3mornings. They have a buffet in the dining room. It was about $15 a person. One waitress decided two of my kids were younger than they are and they were free. That was a lovely treat!!!!the other morning we were not that lucky. The food was good but my kids didn't eat $15 worth of breakfast. The coffee was good and strong!  One morning we ate at the

Summary Heading: Parking fee not mentioned at check in
Summary: When I booked a hotel through a third party it was written parking available it did not mention the fee for parking, that's one thing and I will deal with that company. However at check-in they should have told us as we got a day pass and no they had not mention that we still have to pay $20 for over night parking. We faced with this amount on checking out. They referred me to the third party but they also should draw our attention to that. I paid the fee and even then the machine was asking this time $25. We went back to the receptionist Leo when he finally gave us the pass to go out which he could have done in the first place when we checked out with him and as part of his job and also seeing we were appauled settle it down and not making us go back.  I know it is near Disney
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  You are our most valued guest. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not provide you with the information you needed.  Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. At DoubleTree by Hilton, we promise to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Once again thank you for your feed back.

Summary: If I am ever needing a place to stay out of town, I always look for The Doubletree hotels first! Especially near Disneyland, this is the place to stay! Not only was it reasonable in price for the room, but kids eat free!  This is very helpful if you're on a budget! Friendly and immaculate !

Over the years my family and I have sampled a dozen or so "good neighbor" properties around the Disneyland park area. We're always looking for the perfect hotel that matches price, amenities, quality, and proximity to the park. We are still searching for the "perfect" hotel to meet all of these needs, but the Double Tree Suites came close. The pros for this hotel as compared to some of the others is that the rooms seemed to be a bit larger, the staff was very helpful and adaptive to our needs, and it felt very clean and well taken care of. For the size of room and the overall quality of the hotel, the price was also very reasonable. The only hitch with this hotel is the proximity to Disneyland, or comparative lack thereof. The hotel does have an ART (Anaheim Resort Transit) stop

Convenient location. Very nice hotel located near the  Disney Parks. Good for families with small kids. I like the separation provided by the suits. The kids can be put to bed while the parents stay up and watch TV.

Hotel staff was friendly.  Nothing fancy about this place but reasonably priced and a good location.  The hotel is a bit dated so could use some renovations.  The room was a good size.  Seeing Disneyland fireworks from the window was a perk!

This hotel is a 4 star hotel as they say. The staff was excellent and the hotel was in very good condition considering it was next to the Toy Story parking lot and I'm sure there is a lot of traffic in and out of these near by hotels. The room service and restaurant food were also excellent.

Spend your money at another facilty, no one at this hotel cares or is willing to help. Eye rolling may be a prerequisite to being hired here. Staff was rude and would ignore you if you weren't willing to use services that require tips.
