The location is a little far away from disneyland for me. Yes, the ART bus runs back and forth but it's not free and you pay $5 for an all day pass per person, $3 for one way. Waiting for the bus sometimes took  20-25 minutes. One day I did the walk to Disneyland and it took about 25 minutes. I feel that there are better hotels to choose from that are closer walking distance. Also, there is nothing offered for breakfast that is provided free of
Manager Response: Dear CherryBlossom801,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm sorry to hear we failed to impress you during your visit.  I apologize for the air conditioning issue but I am glad to hear it was resolved quickly.  We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Amazing Hotel. Great service, friendly, helpful, clean. Restaurant serves fantastic food and service. Thank you Mario. :).  Kids eat free. Great selection on the breakfast buffet. Food fresh and hot. Can't say enough about our stay. Thank you for a wonderful stay. We were a party of 5. 3 adults, 2 children. Pool was great for the kids, very clean. Hotel was quiet, and felt very safe.

We stayed last week and it was so nice on arrival we got offered hot choc chip cookies ( so good).  The room was really nice and big it came with free internet, mini fridge and microwave. Disneyland is about a (15-20) min walk up the road and there are lots of places to eat that are within walking distance and there is a target up the road aswell.
Manager Response: Dear Jessie23lee,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the hotel & the surrounding area.  We hope that you can visit us again soon.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: My husband and I were there for the Cavalry Ball that was held there so we decided to get a room there too. The staff was very kind at check in but that cookie that is promised to you at check in was not even offered to us but other than that we were very satisfied with our stay. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable.  Whenever I am back in town again I will be choosing this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda L,  Thank you very much for the great review.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your visit.    I must admit I am very disapointed that you did not receive two of our Famous Doubletree Cookies at check in.  The cookie is a cornerstone of the Doubletree by Hilton experience & I apologize that we failed to offer you some.  On behalf of the hotel team, I'd like to thank your family for its service to our country.  We hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I will definitely stay at this location again.  Very friendly staff, great location, a good value for the money.  Double queen beds are a routinely available option, and for the same price as many competitor's twin double bed rooms. Clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Larry,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m really glad your enjoyed your visit.  It sounds like the Sweet Dreams beds were a good fit for you & your family.  I am happy that you enjoyed the wiggle room our queen queen suites provide.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: I had no problems booking a room; the attendant was kind and helped me made the right room selection.  Upon arival, I was helped and had no problems getting  my room.  The parking was great.  The area aroung the hotel was clean.  The elevetors were great.  The room was great.
Manager Response: Dear Leo M,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review.   I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  It's rare to get a compliment on our elevators & I appreciate you noticing the hotel details.    We hope you’ll give us another visit when you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Our first big trip overseas and to Disneyland brought us to the Doubletree Suites.  Walking distance to Disneyland and the ART bus stop right outside the hotel.  The rooms were clean, comfortable and well appointed.  One of my children has a gluten-free requirement and I found it very hard to find food suitable for him.  The staff at the Doubletree Restaurant downstairs went out of their way at breakfast and dinner to ensure there was something suitable for him to eat.
Manager Response: Dear Fluffybluecat,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm so happy that your big trip to Disneyland was a success!  Chef Rafael takes our guests' special dietary needs quite seriously.   He special orders gluten free rolls & products for guests just like your child.  I'm so glad the team was able to come through for you & your family.  We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you again.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: My Girlfriends and I were lucky enought to stay at this beautiful hotel and the service and rooms couldn't have been better.  We were all on the same floor fairly close to each other so after not seeing each other for a while there was a lot of catching up to do and the rooms were spacious enough to allow us to all gather together and enjoy the evening.  Not going to bed until 4:30, one of the best nights of fun and laughter had in a long time.  Just wonderful!!  Thank you for the hospitality!!
Manager Response: Dear jrlola,  Thank you very much for the compliments!  I’m happy to hear that you had a great time during your reunion weekend.  Sometimes a girls' getaway is just the thing to recharge our batteries.  Although, if you went to bed at 4:30am we may have sent you back to Solvang a little sleepy.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: awesome stay,  great time.  beautiful hotel.  outstanding service.  little expensive at the bar.  but it was still good times.  surroundings of the area  near the hotel was very pleasant and the eateries was very convienent.
Manager Response: Dear Cleve K,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our guests’ feedback is very important to our efforts to continually improve our hotel & its services.  I’m glad that you had an awesome stay with us.  Our location within the Anaheim Resort offers some great restaurants & entertainment.  I'm so pleased you had a chance to enjoy them.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: When I think of staying at a DoubleTree, I think of a little added luxury but the room and amenities were pretty much the same here as they I've had at any other hotel in a lower price range. My room was clean and my bed was comfortable... about as comfortable as a Holiday Inn. The restaurant food was very good but very expensive, though the service was great. I did enjoy the Starbucks in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly P,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review.   I apologize that your experience at our property didn't provide the WOW factor that we have been know to offer other guests.  I'm glad you enjoyed Cafe Biscotti.  I had a Pumpkin Space Latte there this morning & it was great.  We hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Visiting Disneyland with our 3 year old grandson
Summary: I researched the best hotel and location for us to stay at. I was looking for somewhere there would be a restaurant,swimming pool and close to Disneyland.  The Doubletree had it all and there rates were very reasonable. We walked into the hotel and were  greeted right away by the guest services representative and welcomed us to the hotel. The check in was smooth and pleasant. She gave a three cookies which my grandson was delighted with. We went to our room and everything was clean and very . We went up to the pool and it was very clean and well taken care. We had dinner at the hotel and again very well done. Little to our surprise we didn't have  to pay for my grandson as he is 3 yrs old and they offer free dinner for 2 children under 12 with a paying  adult. Dinner and service
Manager Response: Dear Fabpdb,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you & your grandson enjoyed your visit to Anaheim.  The Sweet Dreams Beds & our Famous Doubletree Cookies are proving to be universally appealing.  I'm very happy that you were able to take advantage of the Kids Eat Free program - it offers great savings for families.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: I was excited to sign up for the champagne welcome only to be let down that when I arrived to my room there was nothing in the room. I was asked at the front desk what I wanted and was told it would be in my room when we arrived. When I got there it was not there and after 5-10 still no delivery. I had to end up calling down to inquire where it was. I paid for the upgrade but execution was poor.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle M,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   We apologize that our execution of Romance Package was a disappointment to you. I will pass along your feedback to the team for follow up.  We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Don't expect a smooth cancellation process
Summary: This review is about the booking process. In short, a hotel manager said he would combine an online reservation I previously made with a cheaper one (AAA discount) established over the phone with him.  This was not done, and two reservations were created.  I ultimately chose a cheaper hotel closer to Disneyland and cancelled my reservation, not knowing this other one existed. The end result was a charge DoubleTree will not refund due to a no-show policy, even though it was primarily their error.   You may have a different experience, but this is not the guest-friendly stance I expect from this chain; in the end, I plan to skip all the Hilton hotel chains when possible and have advised my family to do the same.
Manager Response: Dear Steve K,  It's my understanding that you given a full refund for the two no show reservations.    We wish you many safe & happy travels.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort

Summary: This was one of the best hotels we stayed in during our summer vacation. it is located near Disneyland and the rooms are really big and they offer free Wifi. The breakfast was really good and it was cheap compared to the available varieties and options. There are plenty of parking spaces offered at an acceptable price. I, really, cannot find any PROS that I may add.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, but buy the ART ticket
Summary: Upon early check in, our room wasnt ready, but i had to return the rental car, so we stored all our luggage.  When we returned 13 hours later, the room was ready and the retrieval process went smooth.  I was running in the DL 1/2 marathon and so did not need to purchase the ART tickets.  Come Monday morning, after doing the parks for two days and running the 1/2 marathon, my legs were good and tired so I purchased the ART ticket..is well worth it...especially since it drops you off right in front of hotel  the room was large, two queens in bedroom, nice size sitting area, love the desk !

We stayed here for a wk on our family Disney trip. It is a no frills hotel, per se, no valet for parking and we had to call someone from inside to help us with our bags. Check in was smooth and the room was a king size suite, very clean, spacious, had our own fridge and microwave, big plus with kids. Location is very good as Disney is a walk away, ant 10-15 mins. The concierge however did not tell us about all the options for transport and encouraged us to buy the shuttle tickets ($16 for 2 adults and 2 kids). cheaper options are yellow cabs and uber, which we did not know about till later. Breakfast was very good and room service was better than I have had in many top notch hotels. housekeeping was prompt and very good. Overall, a very good experience, will go back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our guests’ feedback is very important to our efforts to continually improve our hotel & its services.  I’m glad that your enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  I would like to apologize that the Guest Services representative didn't meet you at your vehicle to offer bag assistance, which is our standard.  I also regret that we didn't give you the option to take a cab instead of the ART shuttle.  Uber is quite new to our area & our team hasn't had the opportunity fully evaluate the service.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Stayed here in march this year, the staff are great and the the position is good. The rooms are comfortable and it's close enough to the parks to walk. Very nice places to eat are also in the vacinity and the breakfast at the hotel was also good. You can get the free bus to the outlets just down the road on the opposite side
Manager Response: Dear Tomohie,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review.   I really glad to hear you enjoyed your visit.  I am also pleased that you were able to sample the many restaurants & shopping options in the area.  The ART shuttle makes it so easy to get around.  We hope you’ll stay with us again when you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Our stay was comfortable . The room was clean . The bed closest to the window in room 305 needs a new mattress it was kinda lumpy and you can hear the springs when you sit on the bed . It's a very convenient location to Anaheim .   My overall review it's a nice place to stay . And the price was not bad at all.
Manager Response: Dear Chozengirl1432,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit.  I apologize that the Sweet Dreams bed was a disappointment to you.  I have reported your concern to our Engineers for follow up.  We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: This is the place I choose to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Having worked in Anaheim for a number of years, this is the hotel I choose to return to.  The DoubleTree Suites on Harbor Blvd. has an attentive and efficient staff.  Their rooms are clean, spacious and comfortable.  I stay here while on business and when traveling for fun with friends and family.  They never disappoint and the cookies at check-in are an added bonus.
Manager Response: Dear Lisakate111,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.    I’m so happy that you enjoyed the hotel & its services.  There are so many hotel options in Anaheim.  We are very grateful for your loyalty.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Hotel is clean and suite is just perfect for the family. Great distance to Disneyland, Christ Cathedral, Newport Fashion Island Mall and others.  We will definitely book again at this hotel on our future vacation(s).
Manager Response: Dear Eulalia N,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m glad to here the hotel & our location worked well for your family.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: We were staying in Anaheim to visit Disneyland. We were looking for a nice property that wouldn't break the bank but still had great service.  Check in was smooth and the staff were very helpful.  The suites had lots of room for a family to spread out.  We seemed to have forgotten everything so I felt like I was calling the front desk constantly, but they were always chipper and eager to help.  The only thing wrong with the suite was the sink. It had an unusual jut out that meant my daughter could not reach the taps to wash her hands.  I called the front desk again and they came up with a step for her.  I would highly recommend this property.  We walked to Disney both days one way but took shuttles home.  It is a 20 minute walk but after a long day at the park, it is hard walk
Manager Response: Dear dtcs,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review.   I'm so glad to hear you enjoyed the hotel staff.  We are quite lucky to have such a good team.  I agree that the walk isn't too bad on the way to Disneyland but afterward, the ART shuttle is very convenient.  We hope you’ll visit us agin when you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We stayed with our 2 teenage nieces.  they enjoyed the hotel!  The wifi was good.  The rooms were clean and the staff was very helpful and polite!  There is a bus that picks you up and gets you to Disneyland with ease.
Manager Response: Dear Okie-Babs,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you & your nieces enjoyed your recent stay with us.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Stayed here while visiting Disneyland. Great rooms. Excellent (and affordable) breakfast buffet. Staff was friendly and helpful. We stayed in a suite with our 2 kids and it was perfect size for our family of 4. Little long of a walk but there is a bus that can take you to the park (we drove).
Manager Response: Dear Bigrenmeister,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that the suite was a good fit for your family.  Chef Rafael has been working on upgrading the breakfast buffet so I am glad you enjoyed it.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: The Hotel and its staff provided good service. The rooms are well-furnished and the cleaning staff exceeded my expectations every day while there. The Guest Services staff went beyond the call of duty to ensure you were pleased at all times and provided timely assistance.
Manager Response: Dear Shelly-Ann B,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.    I’m glad that you enjoyed the hotel & staff while you were here.  We have an employee recognition program called, "Catch Me at My Best" & it sounds like you did just that.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: I have been going to Disneyland every year of my life.  I have pictures of my mom pregnant with me at Disneyland.  I have stayed at just about every hotel in the area from Motel 6 to Grand Californian and everything in between. This hotel has become my go to hotel now when ever I stay in the area. We like to drive to Anaheim from the Sacramento area and so we usually get in early.  I have never had an issue with early check in.  The room was very nice (I usually get the one bedroom suite and pay about 125 a night, I have visted christmas time, spring break and summer and prices are alway reasonable) and had plenty of room for a family of 4 (w/teenagers). Pool area was nice and clean.  Plenty of seating. (they have pool service for drinks and food or you can grab a drink at
Manager Response: Dear Itsmehollyd,   Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We appreciate your loyalty to the hotel so much.   I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent visit to the hotel. I'm glad we could offer some peace & quiet after a wild day at Disneyland.   Regarding your yearly visits, did you know Disneyland is having a photo contest for guests' favorite memories over the last 60 years?    We hope you'll stay with us again on your next visit from Sacramento.   Kind Regards,   Deborah Fisher, Manager  Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: There are not a lot of options for hotel rooms that sleep a family of 5 near Disneyland.  This hotel was one of the few I found that we could walk to Disney.  Might be too long of a walk for families with small children.  Hotel was very run of the mill for its star level. We were shorted wash clothes one of the day, not a big deal, but just annoying. Also this is just a general comment for all hotels.  If they want me to reuse my towels to be green for another day please provide more hooks and towel bars for drying.  Also when I was doing my Disney hotel research I got varying prices for transportation from Disney.  The bus was $5 a day for anyone over I think 10 and $2 for young ones. We took a cab from Downtown Disney and that was $9.50 plus tip.  Noticed you can drive to
Manager Response: Dear 748amiag,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your visit to Disneyland.   It sounds like we failed to impress you during your visit & I am very sorry about that.  I'd also like to apologize that you weren't given enough wash cloths & that you felt there weren't enough towel bars or hooks.  I'd like to clarify Disneyland parking situation.  The parking fee is currently $17.00 for cars and motorcycles in the many parking lots.  At Downtown Disney, parking is free for the first 3 hours& an additional 2 free hours can be added with validation at AMC Theatres or at select restaurants. Each additional hour costs $6, charged in 20-minute increments. The maximum parking fee is $30.00.  Sadly, there is no free parking available.  We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We had an excellent time overall at this hotel. It's about a 15-20 minute walk from Disneyland (there were homeless people along the way in the morning and night, but they seemed harmless). The only criticisms would be the strange AC that is quiet, but on all night long (and there's no control in the room). Also, I guess at higher-end hotels, you have to pay for parking each night and for breakfast ($4 for cereal and  milk; really?). The room was a nice size, clean, comfortable, and the staff was friendly. Also, this was one of the only hotels in the area that would comfortably fit 5 adults in one room (many Anaheim hotels do not allow 5 people in one room).
Manager Response: Dear AnonymousRex,  Thanks so much for your nice words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Regarding the AC - the control is hidden away in the living room behind the door to the bedroom.  I'm sorry we made it so hard to locate.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary Heading: Gear Place to Stay to Base Disneyland Vacation
Summary: Recently stayed here for a 4-day Disney vacation. Plenty of room in the one-bedroom suite for the 4 of us. Rooms were clean and well equipped. Lobby was very clean and staff was excellent. $10 can to park entrance is the best means to get to the parks - can also walk as it is about a mile. Lots of dining around and a Target just down the street. Great hotels for family. Pool was small - but you don't stay at the hotel for the pool.
Manager Response: Dear NDHurdles,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review.    I'm happy that you enjoyed the hotel & made use of the ART Shuttle.  The ART is such an affordable, family friendly mode of transport fof Anaheim.  We hope you’ll stay with us again if you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: A Quiet Gem in Hectic Anaheim
Summary: Arriving at the Doubletree Suites by Hilton was a pleasant surprise. This was my first Doubletree experience after having stayed at many Hiltons over the past years. The suite was spacious, well appointed and equipped and it was so nice to have a separate living room with a separate TV. Heaven for a couple who doesn't watch the same programs at home or go to bed at the same time. The staff was attentive and provided sewing kits in every suite...bonus! Oh, and when we checked in and almost every morning we were treated to the best freshly-made chocolate chip cookies I've had in a long time! The concierge was excellent with helping to organize tours and find good restaurants! Oh, and we walked to Disneyland several times in 15/20 minutes! What a treat, from arrival to departure!
Manager Response: Dear MonikaDery,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.  I'm really glad you enjoyed your stay.  I’m happy to hear that the suite was a good fit for you & your partner.  I know from experience that having two televisions can prevent discord in a relationship.    Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance (less than 1 mile) to Disneyland.  It was well maintained and the staff was friendly.  They give you cookies at check-in (Chocolate Chip WITH nuts, so our kids wouldn't eat them). They have Disney tickets available for purchase on sight and passes for the bus system.
Manager Response: Dear Joe B,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm glad to see you enjoyed your visit.  We hope that you join us again soon.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in July for our trip to Disneyland. I would definitely recommend this hotel. We stayed in a one bedroom suite. It was very clean and comfortable. We had a view of the rooftop pool that is on the 2nd floor; we stayed on the 4th. The hotel itself doesn't offer a courtesy shuttle to Disney, but the ART shuttle stops right in front of the hotel. We didn't use the shuttle but walked to Disney all 3 days. In fact on our third day we walked over twice. There is a Carl's Jr. just down the street, and a Mexican food place right across the parking lot. Which was good and reasonably priced. We didn't eat at the hotel restaurant, but I believe kids eat free. There is also a cafe with coffee, cereal, fruit. The front desk was very friendly and helpful, and of
Manager Response: Dear eli09Ca,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m so happy to hear that your liked your suite & the hotel's service.  Thank you for pointing out the many restaurants in the area - there's quite a variety.  I'm also glad the Front Desk made a great 1st impression.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Overall a good place to stay.  A little pricey for the ambiance, service and location.  The parking lot was weird too.  But there was a shuttle to Disneyland which was nice and they had a service to put my dog in a kennel so he could ride the bus.
Manager Response: Dear Alison B.  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.    I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: We stayed at the Doubletree for a recent trip to Disneyland.  We were there for four nights and would recommend this hotel for others.  We stayed  in a one bedroom suite which was perfect for our needs.  There is no continental breakfast but the hotel has a small cafe where you can get coffee, cereal, fruit, etc.  We did not eat at the restaurant but did go to the bar which was a very poor experience-- in fact, if our experience at the bar had been more pleasant, I would have given this hotel a higher rating.  To get to Disney from this hotel, we rode the Anaheim Resort Tram which departs every 20 minutes from the hotel.  The tram is affordable and convenient. It is also possible to walk to Disneyland but who wants to get worn out before they even get to the park?  The hotel was
Manager Response: Dear EleanoreE,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I glad to hear you enjoyed your visit.  We apologize that the service in the bar was a disappointment to you.  I have shared your comments with the Food & Beverage team.  We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Good choice for a Disney vacation
Summary: We stayed at the Hilton for 5 nights at the end of July 2014. The hotel is clean and the rooms are well appointed. We are a family of five and we stayed in one bedroom suite. The room was perfect for our needs. We really appreciated the fridge and microwave.  The daily clean up was thorough although sometimes late (passed 3:30).   The restaurant is pricey and the food is less than average. We only had diner there once and regretted our choice after.   The pool is small and could use more maintenance.   Although the hotel is located approx. half a mile from Disney, it gets more than 20 minutes to get to the parks gate (we are fast walkers). The Disney Welcome Center is located inside the hotel (ground floor), which is convenient to buy passes in advance (they do not charge a
Manager Response: Dear Marleblanc111,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review.   I'm glad to hear you enjoyed our suites.  I apologize that your experience in Agio Ristorante was a disappointment.   I have passed your comments about the pool on to our Engineering team for follow up.  We hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: the room had an Unusual odor and didn't feel clean. I Expected much more from brand name hotel.  it Felt more like a motel than a hotel.  Overall I would not stay there again.  I have stayed at other double trees and they were much nicer.  It is time for them to consider a serious remodel.
Manager Response: Dear Tracy O,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   Our rooms & suites were renovated in Fall 2013 so I am a surprised to hear your feedback.  I have reported your comments to the Housekeeping team for follow up.    We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Nice Property and Close to Disney
Summary: We stayed here for a week on a trip to Disney and other southern California attractions.  Great location!  As most people have described here, it's about a 20 minute walk to the Disney park entrances.  The Anaheim Resort Shuttle (ART) is available as well and stops directly in front of the hotel; $5 for the full day and worth it if you don't care to walk.  We choose this location due to it's location -- there are other hotels slightly closer, but this Hilton property is very nice and afforded us a single suite with our family.  We had breakfast daily in the hotel restaurant, Agio Restaurante.  Overall a good variety/selection of food.  The buffet area was clean and well kept.  Eggs and Omelets made to order, along with other hot and cold breakfast items.  Kids 12 and under eat
Manager Response: Dear Kevin L,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our guests’ feedback is very important to our efforts to continually improve our hotel & its services.  I’m glad that you enjoyed the suite and our proximity to Disneyland.  There's something to be said for viewing the fireworks from the comfort of your room.  I'm also happy you made time for a trip to the local beach.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: This hotel was really great - they got our room ready an hour after the other family checked out - Friendly staff and great cookies. Coffee shop is great but restaurant is pricey - Breakfast buffet is really good but lunch was just OK and very pricey!
Manager Response: Dear Shari D,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our hotel during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm glad to hear you enjoyed the hotel, services & Cafe Biscotti.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you again soon.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: As a family of 21 on this trip, we were taking up 9 suites. Upon check in, all rooms were ready and near each other. The cookies were just amazing and the staff made you feel welcome. The pool was clean and usually quiet which was lovely for our younger kids after a day in the parks. The walk to Disney is around 1 mile along a sidewalk but is an easy walk to do. The hotel bar and restaurant were good (lovely buffet breakfast for a good price) and again all the staff were fantastically helpful and friendly. The rooms were very clean and spacious with plenty of storage and having 2 TV's saved a few arguments as I was sharing with my younger brother! Would highly recommend this hotel.

Stayed here with my sister for a couple of nights and we were not disappointed. The hotel is close to the disney parks and was only a short drive. We were greeted by friendly staff at check-in and were given some cookies. They were so warm and some of the best cookies I have ever eaten! We were upgraded to the hilton honors floor and our room was very clean and comfortable. My only complaint is that we had to pay for parking at the hotel. Overall, a nice stay and we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear bermt86,  Thanks so much for your nice words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you liked the hotel & staff.  We recently added the Hilton Honors floor & it sounds like it's working out well.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Great amenities and service! This hotel has the highest rating on the booking sites we used, and was also well-priced. The suite was beautiful, the fact that it was two rooms really made staying with our toddler much easier. Daily clean up was thorough and thoughtful. All the employees we interacted with were helpful and jumped at the chance to help us. I really had no complaints. Oh yeah, and the cookies are amazing! :)
Manager Response: Dear Gabriel I,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our guests’ feedback is very important to our team.  I’m glad that you enjoyed the suite - I think they are ideal for families like yours.  I am also happy to hear your kind words about the staff.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Stayed at this hotel a couple of years ago and was happy to see on this visit that it is still very clean and well maintained. About a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and great access to all freeways.  Great staff.
Manager Response: Dear Angela S,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel.   I'm so happy to hear hear you enjoyed the hotel & staff during your visit.  We hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Stayed 3 nights in November 2013. 10 mins drive to Disneyland. A lot of eateries within 5 mins drive. Denny's restaurant just across the street. Room had 2 queen size beds, ideal for a family of 3. I did not have to request for a roll-away bed like in other hotels. Staff were friendly and willing to help provide advice on how to get around.
Manager Response: Dear EF71R,  I’m so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I'm glad you found the staff friendly & helpful.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Very happy with our stay. We had a double queen suite on the 7th floor (which I believe is the top floor, we paid $15/night for the fireworks upgrade) which was very comfortable and spacious. Is about a 20 minute walk to Disney which I didn't think was a big deal. There is a nice restaurant and kids eat free with one adult ordering an entree which I thought was great value and the food was v nice (and I am pretty fussy!!). Concierge helpful and friendly. Nice cafe in the lobby serving Starbucks coffee. No complaints.
Manager Response: Dear CityGirl55London,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel as well as Agio Ristorante & Cafe Biscotti.  The Kids Eat Free Program is such a great value for families.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: We recently stayed at the Doubletree Hotel in San Diego on Hotel Circle.  That property was unacceptable and totally mismanaged.  So with caution we decided to stay at this Doubletree in Anaheim.  Really nice property and well appointed rooms.  Although the rooms with king size bed were a bit small.  But we also had a room that was a queen suite with 2 queen beds and a separate living room.  Plenty of room and really nice accomodations.  Pool at this property is a bit small and the decking around pool becomes very hot when the sun is shining on it so be careful.  But all in all a nice place, convenient location and nice staff.  Liked the little cafe in the lobby - more convenient than going to the restaurant for a cup of coffee or a latte.  Great planning.
Manager Response: Dear 651karrieb,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We appreciate your loyalty to the Doubletree by Hilton brand.   I apologize that your experience at our San Diego property was a disappoinment to you.  I'm also sorry that the pool area was a bit small for your needs.  I'm glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel, though.  We hope you’ll stay with us again soon.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: excellent room and customer service!  we stayed in 4 different hotels during this family vacation and this hotel was the best.  Our tub did not drain properly but they fixed it right away.  We always received enough fresh towels everyday (family of 5) without asking--now that made a difference.  Customer service was outstanding!
Manager Response: Dear Claude K,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I apologize for the difficulty with your tub but I am glad Engineering adressed it right away.  I'm glad to hear your enjoyed your visit.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: This hotel is not exactly within walking distance from Disneyland if you have very young kids, but it has a convenient Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) stop right in front of it which runs every 20 minutes, at a fee.  Although not as convenient as Disney hotels or those right across the street from Disneyland, the suite offers enough space for entire family to roam about and at a lower rate than Disney hotels.  So it's worth the trade-offs.  We're very likely to return and stay at this hotel.  Pros: 1. Exceptional front desk personnel.  They didn't win me over by the warm cookie (although the family liked it), but they're efficient at check-in and check-out, consistently polite and always helpful.  Leo checked us in and deserved a call-out for his wonderful attitude and efficiency.
Manager Response: Dear funin20s,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm so happy to hear Leo impressed you at check in - he is such a pleasure to work with. I'm also glad that Cafe Biscotti was a pleasure.  I visit them every day for my Triple Non-fat Latte & they are just the best.  We apologize that the Housekeeping service & pool environment was a disappointment to you. We will be sure to mention your comments to both Housekeeping & Engineering for follow up.  We hope that you give us another opportunity for a even better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Well we went to Disneyland. Quite the adventure for our family. We have a teenageboy and a twelve year old girl. We stayed in the Queen suite. This was a good choice for us. Two beds in one room one fold out couch in the next. My kids can never figure out where they want to sleep. This Hotel was great. Free breakfast with the coupons. Hot cookie when you arrive. Nice room. Big Pool. The staff were very friendly. Easy parking access (you do pay $ 16 per day). Now you do have to catch a shuttle if want to get a ride to disney. It is right out in front of the hotel and cost us $20 (up and back)  You can walk but it is about a mile.  This was my only minor set back to my experience with the Double Tree. If you want a closer property go up the street on Harbour toward Disney proper.
Manager Response: Dear Azdawg,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, services & breakfast.  I think our suite layout is ideal for families like yours.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Great hotel for families that need the extra room.  I recommend walking the one mile to Disneyland.  The ACT shuttles are inconsistent with their posted times, are often crowded, and have experienced rude drivers.
Manager Response: Dear Allan C,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   We apologize that the Anaheim Resort Shuttle was a disappointment to you. Though the shuttle is operated separately from the hotel, we will be sure to share your feedback with the ART team.  We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This Double Tree is highly recommended. Quick check-in, large clean rooms, free parking and free delicious breakfast. The staff is very friendly and will do everything to make you feel at home. Within walking distance of Disneyland (15 min. walk) otherwise there is at busservice right in front of the hotel that will take you to Disney.Runs every 20 min.
Manager Response: Dear Michael B,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We appreciate your nice words about our hotel.   I am so happy your enjoyed your stay.  I will be sure to tell Chef Rafael that you liked the breakfast - he has been working very hard to improve it.  We hope you’ll stay with us again when you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This is a great hotel to stay at while at Disneyland.  The rooms are spacious and comfortable.  The location is near Disney, but also there are places to eat nearby.  The staff was all very friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Wendi S,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   I'm so happy that you liked our hotel & its services.  We hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I researched a lot on hotels and my friend told me about this one that they stay at. It's very clean and nice. Disneyland is only a mile away and you could walk if you wanted to or take the shuttle. Staff is very friendly. We had safeway deliver gatorades and water to save money and not buy them in the park. The hotel was so nice and had them put away in our room. They'd clean our room and put our kids stuffed animals all cute on the bed. They'd always be excited to see how they'd set up there stuffed animals when we'd get back from the park. If you're looking to save money and not stay at a Disneyland hotel, but still stay at a nice one this is the place.
Manager Response: Dear Alisha G,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our guests’ feedback is very important to us.  I’m so pleased that you enjoyed your visit.  Our housekeeping team is just spectacular & I'm glad you got to see how fun they can be.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Fantastic hotel. Stayed two nights. Could not fault the rooms, service, staff, restaurant, convenient location to Disneyland, transport at the door.  Highly recommend this hotel. Staying here was a great ending to a 6 week holiday.
Manager Response: Dear Jaassiez,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel & services.  We love our Australian guests.  So much so that our chef has begun offering Vegemite!  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great location and property - close to Disneyland
Summary: Spent 2 nights here during our California trip.  This is a top-tier Hilton property.  It is clean, spacious, elegant to say the least.  The room we stayed in was very spacious and a great value for our family of four.  This property is only about a 7-10 minute drive from Disneyland.  If I go back to Disneyland or Anaheim in the future this would absolutely be the property I would choose.

Loved this hotel! The location is great, about  a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. If you have the option to buy the ART passes for the buses, do so! It is worth it! The room was very clean, and with the exception of housecleaning forgetting to replace the packets of coffee in our room two days, they did a great job! One evening, upon returning to our room, my daughter discovered her blanket in the shape of some sort of flower! The concierge was very helpful in arranging transportation for us. The front desk staff were very welcoming upon our arrival! I would definitely stay here again if in the area! There is a cafe which has some delicious pastries, although it is pricey. There is also a restaurant where we had the buffet breakfast one morning. I wouldn't suggest the breakfast as
Manager Response: Dear nclcrl,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Our guests’ feedback is very important to our efforts to continually improve our hotel & its services.  I am so happy that housekeeping was able to show you their artisitic side. They've even been known to make birds & monkeys out of towels in the past. I'm sorry we missed refreshing your coffee packets, though.  I apologize that the breakfast was a disappointment to you. I do want to assure you however, that the hotel only uses real eggs for breakfast. I hope you'll give it another try in the future.  I’m glad to hear you you enjoyed Cafe Biscotti & the front desk service. I'm also happy you were able to utilize the ART Shuttle - it's so convenient.   I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary Heading: Superb accomodations for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: We just arrived back home from our trip to California to see Disneyland with the kids for the first time. Immediately upon entering the hotel my wife and me experienced a very warm and welcoming environment and staff. Our first impression was one of arriving at an old friends house for a summer vacation retreat. Checking in at the front desk could not have been any more efficient and accurate in detail. The following morning we went to the restaurant, Agio, and were delighted to see the delicious buffet breakfast awaiting guests. After being seated we were warmly and pleasantly greeted by our server Erlinda. Erlinda was very attentive to our family and our requests. Throughout our three day stay we intentionally requested Erlinda as our server because of our initial experience
Manager Response: Dear Apollo01504  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.  It's great to hear the hotel treated you & your family like old friends.  What a nice thing to say!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations & breakfast buffet.  I'm really glad to hear Erlinda provided you with great service.  We are very lucky to have her on the team.  We look forwarded to welcoming you & your family back in 2015!  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Spent 2 nights here to visit Disneyland. Room was clean and very quiet. Beds were very comfortable and the staff were very accommodating and friendly. We did not have time to use the pool. It did seem rather on the small side. However I am sure kids would never notice or care. If you really want a hotel with a good pool environment I would probably stay somewhere else. Otherwise, I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Linda D,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.    I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations & service.  I'm sorry to hear the pool was a bit small for your taste but I hope the large Doubletree Cookies helped ease your disappointment.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Great hotel for the family traveling to Disneyland.  Food there is ok and there are restaurants within a half mile and closer. I've stayed there twice.  The suites have a bedroom and pullout bed in living room. It didn't have a mini fridge however. I got there early around 9am and was able to check in.  They were very accommodating.  Parking is good there, self parking. Close walk to hotel, maybe 1 minute at the most.  They have a concierge there if needed. Easily accessible from the highway and in and out of hotel parking. There is a laundromat across the street if needed. It is ok , I used it.  And always the chocolate chip cookies when checking are something to look forward to for the  kids and adults, lol.
Manager Response: Dear sfuj1212,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I’m glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel & its services.  I wanted to share a couple of items about the hotel, though.   All of our suites & rooms contain a mini fridge - they are hidden away within a pretty wooden cabinet.  Also, for our guests convenience, we offer a two coin operated laundry rooms on site.  No need to run across the street for any surprise laundry needs.  Again, thank you for your kind review.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Very friendly staff, great rooms, comfortable beds.  And at midnight after a day of disney a warm cookie was perfect!  My kids thought the pool on the roof was pretty neat, the hot tub was nice on sore feet from walking all over disney.  The bus stop is right outside of the hotel entrance.  I loved this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Royann D,  Thanks so much for the nice words about our hotel!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel accommodations & our friendly service. Glad you made time for the jacuzzi, which is also a great location to catch the Disneyland Fireworks show.  It's nice to know our famous Doubletree Cookies DO make a great midnight snack.  I hope you can visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: We booked this hotel after reading the reviews. Hotel is very close to Disneyland. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. We found insect bites on our one year old and the staff reacted nicely and promptly when they were notified. They promised a inspection report and summary in one week. For the price we were definitely not expecting any bites during our sleep :-)
Manager Response: Dear Arun S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our guests’ feedback is very important to our efforts to continually improve our hotel & its services.  I’m sorry to hear that your child received some bites while in Anaheim.  Your room was thoroughly inspected by a pest control professional on July 19th after you departed.  I am happy to report that no evidence of insect activity was found.  I hope you find this news reassuring.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Great hotel! We stayed here for our Disneyland trip and it was perfect. The lobby is really nice, the staff was friendly,  the breakfast buffet was really good and kids eat free with one paying adult.   The cookies given at check-in is always a plus. The cookies are always available if you ask.  The rooms were huge and perfect for big families. They had living rooms separate from the bed room and it was very clean. There is a pool on the 2nd floor and you can see the Disneyland fireworks from there. There is a gift shop and a starbucks near the lobby. There is a mall with movies and dining very close. Parking was close and easy to get to. Overall I would stay here again and definitely recommend it for families.
Manager Response: Dear Kicastan,  Thanks so much for your kind words about our hotel.  I’m really happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit.  Thank you for mentioning the Kids Eat Free program.  It's such a great savings for families.  I'm also glad you were able to enjoy the Disneyland Fireworks from the pool.  It's nice to take in the show in such a relaxing area.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: I thought for $209/night we should have gotten free parking and not be charged a delivery fee to get a bottle opener brought up to our suite (seriously!).  The staff was night and the rooms look newly renovated although they didn't smell that great.  The Marriott Suites down the street is much nicer.
Manager Response: Dear Katlai12,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. There are many hotel choices in Anaheim & we appreciate that you selected our property.  I apologize that you felt the room smelled less than fresh.  I've notified housekeeping & they will inspect your room.  We hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Great cookies, Great Restaurant and Amazing Staff that greet you when you come in the door.  This property is located very close to Disneyland and the Anaheim convention center. With quite a few restaurant's that are just little walk away.    The rooms are amazing and very spacious.   Clean / Comfy and Definitely place for families or conference attends.   They do offer a Hilton honors floor which I wasn't able to explore but will do on my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear MattSuper,  Thank you so much for the kind words about our hotel.  I'm happy to hear your enjoyed the cookies, Agio Ristorante & mosts importantly, the staff.  I hope you can visit us again soon.  Warm Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We got a suite, and loved that the bedroom had doors for privacy.  Could buy Disney and bus tickets at motel! The motel had a small store, Starbucks coffee, and a nice restaurant ! A target was two blocks from hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Lhvh,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.    I’m so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  The bedroom doors in our suites do indeed provide restful sleep... & family harmony.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: This is my first choice of hotels to stay at when we go to Disneyland. I always contemplate staying somewhere that's closer walking distance but I like this hotel. The double rooms are helpful so my family can sleep while I stay up and read and it gives us extra space to relax in. The beds are comfortable but the pillows are a little too soft for my taste.  I also like that the rooms come with a fridge and microwave.  I have stayed here twice in 1 month and will probably stay here again when we return to Anaheim. The guy who checked me in and out of the hotel wasn't as friendly as the usual front desk people who help me but he wasn't rude either. Just not  as friendly as I'm used to when visiting the Doubletree. Also we got a room on the 2nd floor this time as opposed to the

I travel 46 weeks a year.  And I am very loyal to the Hilton name and use the Hilton Honors Program.  This hotel experience was less then I would have ever expected.  I had asked for some basic things upon check in, i.e. extra towels delivered because I do not use maid service because my computers and such are always left out.  Never done.  Went down on three separate occasions (it was a 4 day stay) and never did receive the very simple things I asked for.    I always ask them to email me a receipt for my stay.  It makes my expense reporting go much smoother.  Never done.  I had to call back on three separate occasions to get that done.  Just not what you would expect for a $240.00 a night stay, and being a Diamond Member.
Manager Response: Dear Shon K,  Thank you for taking the time to send us a review. We appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton brand.  I apologize that your experience at our property wasn’t up to our usual high standards. We’ve addressed the problems you mentioned with the extra towels and a receipt being e-mailed. We hope you’ll give us another chance if you return to our area.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We found that hotel and staff to be great. Our room had a musty smell but was tolerable. Room service dishes were in the hallway all day until around 6 pm, which was sort of distasteful. Our only real complaint was that the pool area was out of towels. Overall it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Bradley S,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm glad your enjoyed your stay.  I must apologize for the room service dishes & lack of towels at the pool.  We will investigate the musty smell in your room as well.  This items are not typical of our hotel at all.  Thanks again - I hope you will give us another try soon.  Warm Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Wonderful place to stay, quality is what I think of in all areas, room, towels, lobby, restaurant. Never had a problem, great for couples, families, work. Close to Disneyland, fast food, stores, freeways.

Great Hotel and is withing walking distance to Disneyland! We arrived after a long day flying into CA and were greeted with Warm cookies :) Yummy! The staff at the front desk was super friendly and we didn't have any issues the entire time, we stayed for 3 nights. Heated pool on 2nd floor (which is the floor we were on) and you can see the fireworks from Disney pretty good from here. The rooms were very large, much larger than expected, we booked a double queen online and we got not only 2 queen beds in our room (in their own bedroom together) but a little living room area with a pull out bed as well. 2 flat screen TVS a writing desk, fridge, microwave, and a bathroom. Super Nice. Great gift shop, coffee shop, and restaurant (Kids eat free)  We paid about 145/night for a room

Summary Heading: Nice property in Anaheim area, comfortable beds, big rooms
Summary: This property is a good choice for the Anaheim area, if you are looking for big room, reasonable price, and slightly away from Harbor Blvd.  It is 2 blocks away from the Disney area, and has the Disney Welcome Center on the first floor.  It is in the same block as the convention center, and is walkable to both, although I would not recommend walking, at least to Disney.  We ate breakfast there each day, and it was very good, with an omelette bar as well.  Also, if you have 2 adults and at least 2 kids, if the kids are under 12m then they eat free if the adults get the breakfast buffet or order off the menu.  The rooms are spacious, and clean.  They are well appointed with nice furniture.  The layout is such that you can access the bathroom from both the bedroom and living room.

Very good lockton if you are going to Disneyland! Close enough to walk, but take the car anyway because the kids will be beat after a day in the park.  Staff is professional and helpful, and breakfast is exellent!

Hotel was very neat and staff was very friendly.  Walking distance to Disney if you choose to do so, or Disney parking up one block with a shuttle to the park. The kids loved the warm cookie upon arrival and each day they got one from the front desk.  Pool was very clean as well.

We had a great time here.  The staff was extremely attentive and polite, the room was spacious and well appointed, and the pool was fabulous.  Also a very quiet hotel! We didn't try the restaurant on site, but I heard several others say that it was very good.  Parking was also close and convenient, although it would have been great to be free.

From checkin with cookies and a smile to checking on our shuttle to lax at checkout the service was great. Perhaps a little further away from some other offsite hotels but the art bus took care of that in 10m . Rooms spacious for five. A few too many doors in the rooms though... The cleanliness and general appearance was high quality and the little cafe was great for coffee and cereal of a morning. Pool not massive but you can watch the nightly fireworks whilst having a swim ( pool is heated) best of my offsite hotel stays at Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Very spacious rooms in good location
Summary: A good family hotel. The rooms are large and comfortable and well priced. The location is ok however, not a great shuttle service to DisneyLand, I tended to use cabs.  Breakfast service was good and the hotel has an ok pool. Concierge and front desk service was excellent.

I stayed there last week and was put in charge of babysitting my grandkids.  One of them got away from me and got into an elevator alone and disappeared from my sight.  I went to the ground floor and sought assistance from the staff and I must say that they got on the ball and we found my grand daughter.  I want to commend the staff for their assistance and recommend the place highly.  Room Service was very courteous and I enjoyed the bar.
Manager Response: Dear Poopsi1,  Thank you for your kinds words!  I'm so happy Sean at the Front Desk was able to assist you in locating your grand daughter.  I'm also glad your enjoyed room service & the Grappa Lounge.  I hope you & your family can stay with us again in the future.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Rooms were great, with plenty of room for the 5 of us (two adults and 3 teenagers).  Similarly, housekeeping and facilities were nice as well.  Only complaint was the very flaky wifi in our room...  Only places worse that I've experienced were other Doubletrees.  IF you’re staying near the convention center, this is only a 10-15 min walk, so it’s pretty convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Bryan J,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  I have located your room number & will ask our Engineering team to check the wifi signal strength.  Please join us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: I'd originally stayed here about 8 years ago, and most recently again in July 2014.  Management has invested the effort and money to maintain this property as I first remembered it as newly opened.  Despite heavy usage from the Disneyland crowd, the furnishing, fixtures, and overall appearance is worthy of its 4star ratings.  My recent two night stay was enjoyable and a good value for being centrally located on Harbor Blvd.  Never once did I hear any crying children or stomping feet; a testament to the quality insulation and construction of this facility.
Manager Response: Dear Tangster,  Thanks so much for the nice review!  We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel.  I'm glad to hear that the renovations we did last year made as nice an impression in 2014 as a brand new hotel did in 2006.  I hope you can stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Nice way to start our trip
Summary: We booked this online and you are never sure what you get as we have discovered later in our trip. This hotel was however very good and I stop short of saying excellent because the toilet was not quite as clean as perhaps would of liked.   The hotel is centrally located in Anaheim and we walked every where we needed to including to Disneyland. We also went on a couple of bus trips as advised by them to Universal Studios which was an excellent day, and also a tour of LA and Hollywood which was another great day. Both of these tours picked us up from the Hotel. We also walked to Target to get some groceries for our stay.  The hotel was well presented and we found all staff helpful. The only thing that we would of liked was information about what the hotel provided in terms of
Manager Response: Dear Mark F,  Thank you so much for your kind words about the hotel.  I am pleased you liked hotel facilities & that the Concierge was helpful in setting up area tours.  I apologize that the hotel directory wasn't easily located & that the toilet wasn't clean enough for you.  I hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We stayed 3 nights  while visiting Disneyland.  The first day we went up to to pool and it was gross, there was  lots of debris in the water such as bandaids, hair, and other unidentifiable things...the water was extremely salty and warm...and worst of all...the bottom of the pool was slimy as if algae was growing on it.  My impression of the pool is that the hotel doesn't maintain it like it should be.  That said, I will say that the hotel staff were nice  and the room itself was clean... but because my kids love the pool, I don't think we will stay at this particular hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Marlene,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing our property during your stay in Anaheim.   We apologize that the pool was a disappointment to you . We thoroughly clean the pool every morning and check pH levels twice a day.   We hope that you give us another opportunity for a better experience.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton, Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary Heading: Like Mary Poppins, nearly perfect in every way!
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland and had a great experience! From check in to check out, we were treated to great staff hospitality and every request was met with a smile. I am a frequent traveler and it seems rare to have a hotel stay without any issues. I arrived early morning and wasn't able to check in but was able to check my bags with the concierge for the day. Congratulations to the Doubletree staff! I walked to Disneyland the first morning and it was only 15 minutes. The next 2 days, I took the $5/day shuttle, that picks up right in front of the hotel. I recommend the shuttle. Its very efficiently run and the door-to-front gate service can't be beat. Shuttle tickets can be purchased at the hotel front desk. I also purchased my Disneyland passes in the
Manager Response: Dear Golfnutt222,  Thanks so much for the nice review!  I'm really happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel service & facilities.  I'm glad you took advantage of the ART shuttle & the Disney Welcome Center.  It's nice to be able to skip box office lines & avoid walking during the warm summer months.  Please visit us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Conveniently located next to the Anaheim Convention Centre and very close to Disneyland, this is a great option for families. The rooms are ample, comfortable and clean. Cookies are offered free and are a nice welcome treat.

*I was given a final, after-tax price over the phone for a 2 night stay.  At check-out my bill was about $100 more, due to parking fees and additional taxes.    *The first night our AC wasn't working, and we couldn't sleep well in our own sweat.  They fixed it by the 2nd night, but offered no apology or compensation.  *Otherwise, the facilities were nice.
Manager Response: Dear DouglasF940,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel.  I'm sorry to hear the taxes & parking came as a surprise.  The reservations team should review taxes & fees, including parking, while booking the room.  The hotel adds no additional fees or charges.    I'd also like to apologize for the malfunctioning AC in your room. It is my understanding our Engineering team remedied the issue as soon as they were allowed access to the room.  I hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We stayed here for four nights primarily for visiting Disneyland and overall had a great stay. The room we stayed in was in very good shape but needed some minor attention in places like the light switches which needed a good cleaning (why I always bring disinfectant wipes!).  The bed was comfortable and the shower pressure decent.  The one morning we tried the breakfast it was very good with tons of options.  The only wish I have is they had a dedicated shuttle to Disneyland. We walked to and from the parks and it really wasn't a problem, it's about 15 minutes at a good pace, obviously longer if walking slower.  We would definitely stay here again next time we visit Disneyland, unless another Hilton property opens closer to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Mark O,  Thank you so much for the nice words about the hotel.  I apologize that the light switches in your room weren't cleaned properly.  We will make sure to mention this to the housekeeping team.  I am also sorry to hear that you weren't aware the Anaheim Resort Transit system is available just outside the hotel entrance.  For a small fee, guests can access the Disneyland Resort & area attractions all day.  I hope you will consider staying with us again in the future,  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: This is a nice hotel, close to Disneyland and very convenient.   We enjoyed our stay and this hotel.  We were there because of VIDCON (Youtube convention).  Our kids wanted to attend this convention and we did not want to disappoint them.  I will recommend this stay to anybody.
Manager Response: Dear Elmer L,  Thank yo so much for the kind words!  I'm very happy your family chose to stay with us during VIDCON.  I hope the convention was fun for everyone & that you'll join us again soon.  Best regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: We moved here after a terrible experience at a different hotel. The difference was night and day. Overall a good hotel.  A few hiccups. When we checked in, we noticed that the linen on the sofa couch was not changed from the previous guests. Also, the wash basin was not draining well. Spoke to the front desk. They sent up clean linen, and had us change the sheets ourselves.  Nothing was done about the wash basin.  I fully understand when things are not always perfect at a hotel, but I expected management to make this up to me, for the inconvenience. Sadly, this was not the case here. Still, a good hotel, but rather pricey.
Manager Response: Dear JBS183462,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel.  Feedback like yours is very helpful in many of our on-going training efforts.  I’d like to apologize for the hiccups you encountered during your recent stay.  It is our policy to dress the sofa bed with a set of sheets after every guest & it is my understanding that is what  you encountered upon opening the sofa.  In addition, our Engineering team should have been called to address the issue with your sink when it was reported.  Again, I apologize for the disappointing stay.  We hope you will consider giving us another opportunity the next time you are in Anaheim.  Warm Regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort - Convention Center

Summary: Very nice place to stay.  The staff was friendly and very professional.  Close to Disneyland and surrounding business.  Rooms were clean and the pool and gym was great.  The hotel is clean and the rooms were spacious.

This is one of the best hotel I stayed in Disneyland area.  Clean, spacious, good customer service, free wifi and parking.  Highly recommended, and will stay with them again for sure.  We have one bedroom suite, which would be good for family of 4.
Manager Response: Dear sasa99,  Thanks so much for reviewing our hotel.  I’m so glad you & your family enjoyed the hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: This was our 7th stay here in as many years for our Disneyland trip, and it was delightful, as usual. We drive from WA state each time, and this hotel was actually recommended to us by a longtime Disney employee back in 2007 on our first visit. This time, I traveled alone with 4 children, and once again my expectations were exceeded. I like that we see the same staff each time, from the bellman to the restaurant staff. Javier is always so kind and helpful, and we appreciate his friendly greeting when we return to the hotel each day. The breakfast buffet is delicious, with plenty of options for everyone. We love having Erlinda as our server, her personalized attention to detail and her dedication to superb service shows in everything she does. Even my kids---who normally couldn't
Manager Response: Dear SoCalFan6,  Thank you so much for your loyalty to our hotel!  It’s a long drive from Washington & we appreciate being your hotel of choice in Anaheim.  I’m really happy that you recognized Javier & Erlinda, they are very valuable members of the team.  We can’t wait to welcome you back again.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary Heading: Great place for a family stay
Summary: We were here for an event at the Convention Center, which is a short walk away. The suites are a good size - we had 3 people and there was plenty of space to move around, and for 1-2 people to get up and watch TV or work while others slept in.  The bathroom has enough doors to allow privacy.    The front desk staff was very nice with check-in and of course the kids thought the cookies were heavenly.  The breakfast buffet is really good - a bit expensive but for the amount of food and quality I had no complaints.  There was a ton of excellent fresh fruit.    Best part - the bed was extremely comfortable. I'm pretty picky about beds and pillow and slept fabulously every night.  Overall a good choice.
Manager Response: Dear JoKnits,  Thank you for the nice comments about the hotel.  I’m really happy to hear you enjoyed the suite & breakfast.  I’m also glad the Sweet Dreams Bed was comfortable – they really are a treat!  I hope you’ll be able to stay with us again soon.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: Hotel was in perfect location for Disneyland, 15 min walk or bus stop across from hotel about 5mins. Large spacious rooms that were kept spotless. We arrived at the hotel minus our luggage due to connection problems with our flight, when we advised reception of this we were given a toiletry supply to tide us over ( big plus after a 10 hr flight ). Big thank you to reception staff and concierge staff for looking after our luggage when it arrived and for all their useful info about the surrounding area. All in all I would recommend the Doubletrees for a family vacation.
Manager Response: Dear WalkerClan11,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I’m so glad the Front Desk & Concierge were able to assist you when your luggage was delayed.  Traveling is stressful enough, even with your bags in tow.  At Doubletree by Hilton, making the traveler feel human again is a part of our mission.  I hope you can stay with us again on your next vacation.  Warm regards,  Deborah Fisher, Manager Doubletree Suites by Hilton Anaheim Resort – Convention Center

Summary: The hotel is close to disneyland. You can reach there by walking in 20 minutes. rooms are big, very clean. Beds are very good. Breakfast is average. İf ı go los angeles again I  prefer this hotel. carpark is daily 16 $.

If you are tired of being in crowded small hotel rooms, this is the hotel for you.  We had a nice sized living room with a television, sofa, and a couple of chairs, plus a desk.  The bedroom had two comfortable beds.  The nightstand lamp had 2 places to plug in your electronics.  I love that.  The bathroom was good and the sink and counter outside the bathroom was very nice.
